text: Wonderful!!  Very relaxing, refreshing, professional.  I look forward to returning.

resp.text: That is great to hear. Thank you for your feedback!

name: Hope Richardson
text: Julie gives the BEST  facial I have ever had! If you have not had a facial from Julie Mahieu YOU are missing out..

name: Jessica Hughes
text: I have been 100% happy with my services here.

name: Debbie Patton
text: I went for a peel, which I have never had before.  Julie was FANTASTIC, professional and personable, and will most definitely go back.

name: Carolyn Cowper
text: Great Service and wonderful staff!!!

name: Lexi Nicole
text: Best experience EVER!!! Julie is AMAZING!!!!! 10/10 WILL BE BACK!!

resp.text: That is great to hear. Thank you for your feedback!

name: Sheila Bennett
text: Excellent staff

resp.text: Thank you!

name: WAYNE BURGESS
text: Julie is very nice and thorough!

name: Jennifer Jordan
text: Julie is awesome! Highly recommend!

name: Olivia
text: Have been to this spa multiple times for facials by Christy. She is great and everyone at the office is very professional!

name: Murlene Ward
text: Love this place

name: Caitlin Leonard
text:
This is my second time at Dr. Willis' office and it will definitely be my last. The first  time I went to her office  I didn't have any problems besides having to call to get my results and the office not answering their phones. This year her office emailed me about making my yearly appointment which I did. I called the office and was sent to voicemail which they ask you to leave information. After three days of not getting a response I called the office and the receptionist was nice and scheduled me for the only available appointment until August. The next day I received a call from another receptionist responding to my voicemail that I sent earlier that week..... The day of the appointment I called Dr. Willis office EIGHT times trying to get someone to help me locate the office (I hadn't been there in two years because of school). After the first three calls not being answered (15 minutes late to the appointment at this point) I was transferred to the emergency line (was on hold for 5 mins). Without even asking my needs I was transferred to another hotline which transferred me to another hotline that transferred me back to the original person I was trying to speak with! After being on hold multiple times for almost 15 minutes I hung up, called back and the exact same thing happened again. After 30 minutes of trying to find the office I finally was able to talk to someone and ended up canceling the appointment.

This was the most frustrating and difficult doctor's experience I've ever had. I do no recommend!

name: Porcia Nickerson-Bowen
text: I have been under the care of Dr. Willis for 17 years and she is the best at her profession as well as the nicest person that you will ever meet. And if you know her then you know that she is sincere with everything that she says and does. It shows that she loves what she does as well as she loves her patients. I would not trade her for anything in the world and I would recommend that if you want a  professional, spiritual and genuine person seek her services. When God made her, he broke the mold...she is one of a kind. We love  you Dr. Willis.

name: Alesia Ray
text: Dr Willis is the best obgyn I've used in my forty years. She makes you feel calm and taken care of. She listens to your concerns and genuinely cares about your health. I'd recommend again and again.

name: Ashley Wynn
text: I am a new patient with Dr. Willis and so far she has been amazing. She's very caring and down to earth. I am definitely satisfied so far.

name: LaJulia Fritz
text: She was one of the best doctors I have ever had she took care of me and made sure that I delivered a healthy beautiful baby

name: Dakota Winter
text: Dr.Willis was highly recommended by a close friend. In the beginning I was unhappy about the wait time. However, I voiced my concern; since then we have developed a wonderful relationship. Dr. Willis and her staff are amazing. I will be forever grateful for their kind spirits.

name: Ronterica Williams
text: I’ve been seeing  Dr. Willis for 15 years. She delivered my kids and she is the best Doctor ever. I love how she talks with me and explained everything from the beginning to the end. Thank you Dr. Willis for all that u do and have done😘!

name: Lalaa Parker
text: Amazing doctor. Thorough information given every appointment with wonderful staff to help.

name: Ashley
text:
Great Doctor, Great Staff!
She Cares For Her Patients, Gives Very Good Information, And I'm Looking Forward To Her Delivering My Baby!

name: The Traveling Family
text: If your looking for a great doctor that will actually listen to you, then Dr. Willis is your doctor. She is AWESOME!!

name: Moore and Young Legal Solutions
text:
I have been seeing Dr. Willis for the past six years. She has been a wonderful doctor over the years and her staff is equally as amazing.

In June 2015 I suffered a serious complication while pregnant, and my child had to be delivered seven weeks before her due date. Because of Dr. Willis's extensive knowledge, she was able to stabilize my vitals to allow additional time for my child's lungs to develop more. It was then I knew for sure that I would be a patient as long as I live in the Birmingham area.

Another thing I love about her is that she honest; even when I don't want to hear the truth. Lol! But she will lays everything out and answers all questions; thus giving you the ability to make an informed decision regarding your healthcare.

name: Jasmine Nolen
text: One of the worst doctors I've ever had in my life. She literally never answers the phone.

name: Kayla Mims
text: I cannot speak highly enough about this practice! The staff here is amazing! They were so friendly and kind as soon as I walked through the door. The nurses were very attentive, and Dr Bourgeois was so nice. He was smiling and attentive to everything I said. He is extremely thorough, and will absolutely get down to the bottom of whatever is going on with you. My Dad and I both use him, and Dr. Bourgeois has been so helpful for us! Highly, highly recommended!

name: Robby
text: They got back with me quickly and set up an appointment.

name: Jon Bryant
text: Friendly staff

name: Janet Adams
text: By far the best customer service and caring people I have had the pleasure of seeing! Never would think of going anywhere else! Stephanie, Summer, Dr McDonald, Sherry, and Dan are the most transparent and honestly amazing people to work with for my laser and Botox needs! Dr McDonald has been doing my treatments for several years and I can never say positive enough things about him and the rest of the people I have seen over the years! Always a great time when I go in, and has helped my migraines a lot, even though that’s not the reason I go there❤️

name: Stephanie Duncan
text: Excellent experience with their services! Their staff is professional, polite, and accommodating. Will be a returning client! Why can’t I give more than 5 stars to Med-I-Spa!?

name: cathy Gamble
text: The staff is personable. I had several good experiences at IM. But, my last filler appointment with D. McDonald was absolutely terrible and totally disappointing. My face was bruised and the filler misplaced and I suffered with swelling etc.  for almost two months. I have the photos to support my complaint. It should have been a simple process. It was instead painful and irresponsibly performed. I have requested a refund for the service. I have not received it at this point. But, I am still demanding reparation for the costly and painful experience. It should not have happened. Any solid business provides a refund for poor customer service almost immediately upon receiving the complaint from a long term customer. Customers beware McDonald can perform poorly and ownership does not respond promptly or provide refunds promptly even when they know the customer clientele! A Risky Business! There needs to be more regulatory control of these facilities and they are not recognized by the Better Business Bureau and that’s another red flag... customers beware!

name: Kimberly Holley
text: Ladies and gents!  Don't make the same mistake I did...do your research and asked for personal before and after picture of their work.  Exactly today, a year ago- I went to Infinity Med-I-Spa in Homewood and was seen by Dr. Matt Brunson.  First let me say Dr. Brunson, is extremely nice; however dermal fillers is not his specialty.  Upon his suggestion, I went with the more expensive filler...and although it was painless - it was horrible!  My lips were so lumpy, uneven and leaking - even 1 month later.  I had to make an emergency trip to come back to the state of Alabama - just to have them dissolve the fillers.  A year later, I still have a permanent lump from the injections - which is noticeable with or without lipstick.  I wish I would of took more time and did research, rather than being spontaneous and just going for it - while passing through.  I gave them 2 stars, because Dr. Brunson- did give me his personal number and  stated he would correct it - but when I called the office (infinity Med-I-Spa) to make arrangements - I was given the run-around!  So basically I paid $350+ for nothing!  So disappointed and disgusted

name: Amanda Johnson
text: I have called multiple times to make an appointment and not once has anyone answered the phone.

name: Juana Silva
text: I highly recommend this spa! The staff is fabulous and did an excellent job! Their equipment is medical grade and the interior of the spa is beautifully decorated and extremely well kept. The prices are very reasonable, especially for the area of Birmingham that they are located in. I'm definitely going back!

name: Cindy Hafley
text: Super nice staff, very relaxing and comfortable environment. Sybil performed my massage and made me feel very at ease. Would definitely recommend.

name: Mihir Desai
text: Excellent experience!  Cindy was very professional and knowledgeable.  She took time to understand my needs and kept me informed throughout the massage!  I think I might get addicted to this kind of pampering!  Thank you to my wife for getting me this Father's day gift!

name: Alane Reid
text: Friendly staff, I felt so welcomed. The doctors was funny and laid back, and made me feel as if he had always known me! I will definitely be back!!!

name: julia quijano
text: Just amazingly personable staff - great experience!

name: tradesallofjack
text: Came for my first massage ever and WOW!! Darrius (masseuse) did an excellent job! My back and legs feel much better. I will be back in the future.

name: Jason Higgins
text: They have a great understanding staff except one lady at the desk. I am being treated for opioid dependence due to my service in Iraq. My house was robbed and all meds were stolen I missed one call saying they'd call in my meds. I try the next day to go in and get it fixed and the lady at the counter told me to toughen up its only 3 weeks of being sick and talked to me like I was less than human. I love all the other staff and the Doctor but if I hadn't had 2 years clean and sober I'd probably be back on drugs after the treatment I received today. All but this one person has been great but the way I was treated was inexcusable!!! Love everything else

name: JOSHUA BROWNING
text: The place has multiple locations. All of which work together for me to be seen. I  couldn't ask for anywhere else with better understanding. Great place that has helped me deeply.

name: Hoover Alabama
text: Liked my first massage, but getting an appointment is almost impossible.  It was a Groupon, and I know having lots of business is great, but when it is almost impossible to get an appointment, they need to schedule personnel better, or hire more people.  I finally gave up, and will let my Groupon expire, and will never go back.

name: Corinna Bass
text:
Love having professionals help me in my weight loss journey!
The staff is so nice and the Dr gave me a meal plan, food journal and tools to help me get this weight off!

name: Mallory Forrest (Agent Skully)
text: Got a Groupon, got a massage there and LOVED IT! However, late last night my dog broke her jaw. I HAVE to take her to the vet today obviously, and when I tried to cancel my appointment today, they told me I could either cancel, lose my Groupon, AND pay a $50 fee or reschedule and pay a $25 fee. They obviously don't recognize a true emergency and have no empathy. I work at a doctor's office, so I KNOW you can waive those fees during a true emergency. After my Groupon is used I will never go back and I don't recommend using them.

name: Gina Pearson
text: While I had some good experiences early on with appointments for massages, facials, and laser, I have had two bad experiences lately.  Rude staff and argumentative management are not what I expect to encounter when I am paying for services at a place that promotes itself as a spa.

name: Sandra Miller
text: Great experience and the products TNS Lip Plump System and I verta skin Brightening System with omplex .5 helped my early aging on my face

name: Brittany Youngs
text: If I could give them no stars I would. The staff has been rude every time I have tried to deal with them. I will never be going back and recommend you don't spend your money there. Just because you find a cheap Groupon for their services doesn't mean you should buy it. NOT WORTH IT!

name: Shelina Bertrand
text:
Dear Dr. Koehler,
You saved my life that day I sat in your office crying because I had to undress for this appointment.  You had the most kind and generous heart in that moment but you gave me great advice that I took. I came into your office broken and secluded because I didn’t recognize myself. You said,  “go talk to a doctor about the sleeve /weight loss surgery then come back and see me.”Best decision I’ve ever made, I just couldn’t do it any other way.  80lbs later, I am healthier and happier for it.  Then I came back and you did your magic makeover on me. You took all that skin and snatched it back even better than I was before including my scratch marks from 2 children. You sculpting my waistline like I had been in the gym all my days. My breast lift looks like Im a 20 years old again.  You absolutely did an amazing job and gave me back my confidence and my active life with my family again.  The only downside is I am happily married and have to fight the guys off daily now.  One gentleman who was 55 years old, asked how old I was and I said your age. He continued to say, women don’t look like you at our age because he had been looking for a while.  I didn’t share my secret, I just said thank you. But he kept saying wow you are beautiful so maybe I should have.  Needless to say it is a good thing I love myself, my husband and GOD.  Yes, my husband loves my new body also but he is more excited that I will  come Jet-skiing with him now and I’m back at the beach again feeling confident.  Thanks too you and your wonderful staff for taking good care of me every step of the way.   Forever grateful ......Blessings to you

name: Kaylyn Ingram
text: I went to Eastern Shore Cosmetic Surgery to receive a hydra facial and it was amazing! The experience was very relaxing, the environment was beautiful, and Brittany Lee was incredible! She was so sweet and informative about all the steps we took during the facial. I will definitely be back. Thank you!

name: Alisande
text:
I am so glad I found Dr. Koehler.
The office is on a private enclosed area offering peace and privacy. It feels more like a Spanish Pueblo getaway with its opulence and beautifully
flowered landscapes.
The staff is jovial and mindful of you and it truly is genuine.
Denvia was superb and helping me understand this process and turned the difficult decision of remove my implants into a much needed goal and accomplishment.. The nurses and anesthesiologist were so very attentive that my anxiety with this procedure was close to nothing. I already referred two girlfriends before coming based on my dealings with Denvia and what I read on several review site. I thank Dr. Koehler and Co. Truly happy with this choice.

name: Karonda Lee
text: I recently had my consultation back in September 2020. We were preparing for a major hurricane at this time. Doctor Koehler and his staff knew how important me keeping my appointment was. Due to the pandemic, I let my previous consultation results expire.(Round 2 Consultation) They reached out and asked if I could come in earlier before the weather got bad, and I said of course!! To see all of their smiling faces, hear the smiles in their voice and also the warm welcome was just the start of it all. Dr. Koehler was very confident in what he could do for me, and that is give me the flat tummy and waistline that I desire. December  2020 is my surgery date! I absolutely recommend Eastern Shore Cosmetics and it’s Staff along with Dr. Koehler to anyone, and this is before Surgery!! So I can confidently say that I would recommend afterwards as well:-)

name: Kathy Barnard
text:
Dr. Koehler and his entire staff are fantastic.  I had a face lift several months ago and my family could not tell it.  I had no problems and recovered well.
I would recommend him for any type of surgery or procedures.  He is the  best.  KB

name: L Melton
text: Highly skilled surgeon well above par. Staff is excellent! My experience was amazing and after so many disappointments in other locations I thought I’d never find who I was looking for! Who knew the best would be in Alabama of all places and trust me I travel a lot. He knows what he’s doing and you can totally tell he’s confident in what he’s saying to you and he’s not just blowing smoke. My results were well beyond what I expected. I’m so happy I found my guy.

name: Tara
text: Dr. Koehler are fantastic. The entire staff is so kind, great at explaining things, and putting patients at ease. The office is beautiful and they do a fantastic job here!

name: rachel mims
text: I didn't have my procedure done here but Dr. Koehler was very pleasant and informative. He wasn't confident he could give me the results I want, the way I want. So he didn't waste my time. He was more interested in my happiness than my money which is a rarity these days!

name: Laura Jeanne
text: Dr. Koehler and his entire staff are absolutely fantastic ! Special shout out to Denva Who was extremely patient with me and has a wonderful personality. Top-notch professional friendly courteous and understanding I couldn’t be happier with the results of my surgery Thank you so much.Don’t bother looking anywhere else the best is right here (Dr.Koehler)😁

name: Maria Williamson
text: Dr. Koehler is amazing!! I recently had a complete nose reconstruction with a bone graph from my skull. His confidence and knowledge of the procedure made me feel at ease with having such an complicated surgery done. The bedside manners of Dr. Koehler and his staff are professional and courteous. I read his reviews before I made an appointment with him and I was NOT disappointed. I highly recommend him to anyone who is interested in cosmetic surgery.

name: Jessica Ganey
text: Dr Koehler is simply amazing! He truly helps people restore confidence in there self. His staff is so sweet and they go above to make sure you are well takin care of. I’ve never felt comfortable in my own skin until now and I can’t thank Dr Koehler and his team enough for everything they have done.

name: Christine Harrington
text: Excellent place !!!

name: Calebjenni Hunt
text: I traveled to see Dr. Koehler. It was worth every single mile and I would do it again without hesitation. Every single staff member is top notch. If I could give above the five-star rating, I certainly would. The expertise, the care, the fantastic results, and bedside manner is beyond five-star service. I was a tough case, and I knew I had to find the best. Dr. Koehler came highly recommend, and I see why! Dr. Kohler did an amazing job. My family and I were treated with such care. Everything was explained in great detail. I would not go anywhere else if I ever needed surgery again. Thank you to everyone at Eastern Shore. You all are amazing. I am so happy with my choice to see you!

name: Marie Diane
text: After having received services I was told I now need to make a deposit.  Bad business!

resp.text:
Hi Marie,

While Injectable appointments do not require a consultation fee, we charge $75 for surgical consultations with Dr. Koehler. Surgery and certain other services do require a deposit before the procedure. These are standard practices among cosmetic surgeons across the country, but we apologize if you were surprised to learn about our policies. We are happy to answer basic questions and provide general pricing information over the phone without charge.

Dr. Koehler

name: Tricia Niemeyer
text:
The decision to under go cosmetic surgery is a process.. not something you wake up and make a phone call to schedule as if it was a haircut.
I deliberated for quite sometime and began hearing good things about Dr. Koehler and then I noticed some of the faces to go along with the comments I was hearing.  These were people that looked rested, younger and felt good about themselves, which was exactly my reason for considering surgery.  Dr. Koehler was  just amazing to work with, he was  honest about results, professional and absolutely a magician.  I could go on and on, but suffice it to say that if you are considering cosmetic surgery go see Dr. Koehler.

name: Just Me
text: All the staff has been quite friendly, but I've never waited less than an hour and half after my scheduled appointment just to be called back, and then at least another hour just be seen afterwards. Even for simple follows ups, where Dr. Voss is in the room for less than ten minutes. My first appointment there had me waiting for four hours to be called back. Clearly, too many people get scheduled at one time in place that may also need to make time for random emergencies.

name: G B
text: I've had nothing but great experiences with Dr.Voss as well as the entire staff. They are very thorough and patient with any of my questions or concerns. I'm ok with waiting at times because some situations need a little more attention. The longest I've waited has been an hour and that was because she was delivering a baby that day.  People will wait in a restaurant for hours to eat but gripe about the time it takes to take care of your health.  Great job to this staff dealing with today's society.

name: A01
text: DO NOT GO TO DR. VOSS. I moved to Dothan towards the middle of my pregnancy in 2018. I was initially seeing another doctor who I loved but Voss delivered my son. At my 6 week check up, I informed her that I have fibroids and wanted to be prescribed the same medication that I was on prior to pregnancy to decrease the pain from menstrual cycles. She flat out told me that SHE did not believe in pain reliever medication and would not prescribe it. She also stated that my birth control should “handle it” and walked out of the room without allowing me to respond. I never returned to that office. She is a horrible doctor! She showed me that day that her views were more important than my health and my pain. That’s more than unprofessional.

name: Tore Hudson
text: People are great. Wait times are ridiculous.

name: Jill Biggs
text: They are the Best .

name: Angelique B.
text: Dr. Voss is the worst. I have waited for over an hour after my schedules appointment for all my appointment. This appointment today I’m at 2 hours and still waiting. She’s so disconnected with her patients. She a promonda that knows if a patient is her we need help. But instead she makes you wait until she’s ready to see you. I will call my insurance and change her as my caregiver. The worst ever!!!

name: Ronniesha Oliver
text: Dr. Voss is great. It takes some time but she's very thorough with her patients and make sure all your needs and complaints are taken care of I couldn't ask for a better doctor.

name: ARLEA MCDANIEL
text: Dr. Torrance has been my gynecologist since I moved back to Alabama since 2016.  She did my hysterectomy and I must say she is one of the best doctors that I have had since moving back.  For me she is very comfortable to talk to and very thorough.  Now I can say a few times that I have been there I have had to wait at least 45 minutes for her or her assistants to come in the room and one time I thought that they forgot I was there.

name: Beth Holland
text: I've been a patient of Ladies First for 6 years. Dr. Voss spends time with me to answer any questions that I may have.  She is attentive and listen to my concerns. The nurses are quick to call back me back with any questions I may have. The staff is professional and knowledgeable, always accommodating!  I am especially fond of the Enterprise office, these ladies are true caretakers and love their jobs, it shows!  I've also used Sabrina Kelley for weight loss and got great results.  I recommend Ladies First of Dothan for any type of women's needs.

resp.text: What a marvelous comment. Thank you!

name: Wendy Golemon
text: My overall experience was great at. Ladies First. I was greeted when I walked in and made to feel like a friend not a patient. Angeline and Skyler at the front desk make you feel welcome and answer any questions you have. The nurses assistant Jamila was friendly and helped with my anxiety of being there. Then, I met Pam Jones the ARNP and she was wonderful at easing your mind and very knowledgeable. Dr.Voss also stopped in and introduced herself. She was really friendly and explained everything she was doing and answered all questions I had. I definitely will keep this provider! Great service!

name: Aubrey Miller
text: I want to start off by saying I was hesitant to come to this OBGYN office based on some other reviews. I noticed a pattern that a lot of reviewers complained of the wait time and I will say that I did have a couple appointments where I waited a little longer to be seen. It really wasn’t that long so it was barely worth mentioning but I figured I would since it seems to be an issue with other patients. But knowing what I know now I understand why. Dr. Voss is amazing. I came in for my pregnancy and ended up being high risk. She explained everything in great detail and what the plan would be for my pregnancy. She even addressed why there may be a longer wait time sometimes, which I didn’t even bring up, but I thought it was nice that she did. It shows that she’s aware of patient concerns and doing what she can about it. They see patients for regular appointments but also unscheduled appointments if there is an issue that isn’t severe enough for the ER but still needs to be addressed quickly. This was me on a couple of occasions. I called in the morning on 3 separate occasions and was seen within a couple of hours due to complications with my pregnancy. So I really appreciate being seen so quickly and will take waiting a little bit longer for scheduled appointments because of it. The entire staff is very friendly and attentive. When things got serious with my pregnancy Dr.Voss was on top of it and I couldn’t have asked for better care. Things could have gone a lot worse for a lot of reasons but her quick action due to her vast knowledge made sure that the outcome was best case scenario. She followed up with me a couple of times after everything to make sure I was doing okay and I really felt like she took her time. She spent a considerable amount of time talking with me about everything, which is not always the case with some doctors. Very often I feel rushed when I am seeing a physician so in the situation I was in it was nice to feel like I had her ear and care. I wouldn’t hesitate to come back to Dr. Voss for future pregnancies or any other needs. Thank you so much Dr. Voss ❤️

resp.text: Your thoughts are very much appreciated! Thank you. Sending you and your family the best of wishes 🙏

name: angelia martin
text: I absolutely LOVE Ladies First Med Spa, they are ALL so warm, genuine and welcoming and make you feel special, not just another client. Christy takes extreme pride in her work and strives for optimal results tailored specifically for each of her clients concerns, goals and desires, her enthusiasm is contagious and she is truthful about what to expect and will guide you in making the best decisions to achieve the best results. Dr. Voss wants her patients to feel comfortable, relaxed and happy with any and all services provided, just as much as Christy. They work together as a team and make your experience a very warm and positive one and will go above and beyond to ensure that you have the absolute best experience and results!

resp.text: Thanks so much!!!  We love you and your always lovely smile!!! Your personality warms your path!!!

name: Jessie Holmes
text: I’m honestly surprised at the negative reviews. We had our second child with Doctor Torrence, who is an absolutely amazing woman. We just found out we are pregnant with our third and are excited to be back. The staff have always been kind and helpful, never had any issues in the full 9 months we were there before. They Always returned our calls, always kept us informed. Repeat customers here!

name: Deborah Isler Mercer
text: I went here a few years ago, but switched to my regular physcian so I could get it all done in one place. Well, my physician has left town and I went back to Ladies First last week for my checkup. I saw Haley McDaniel on my visit  and she was great!  She was very professional and didn't seem to be in a rush or act like it was a bother to  answer any questions. Everyone that I encountered there was very nice!

name: DV8
text: Have been friendly and helpful with our first pregnancy , thank you .

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind thoughts.  It is our privilege to care for our pregnant patients and wish the best for our future generations of babies♥️

name: Kaitlyn Bluto
text: There is absolutely no communication on appointments. They call me and when I call back they claim they never called. Then I miss an appointment and they never even told me of that appointment. I just want my results and birth control and that's not even happening. Never go there.

name: Mr. Locke
text:
Years ago, this review would be four stars, however, lately the appointment Times seem to be suggestions. You arrive early, as usual, but don't get seen till an hour or two past the appointment time, despite your appointment time is 30 minutes after the office is opening.

Literally the best time for an appointment is 8:00am, when the office first opens. In that case, you only have to wait twenty to thirty minutes to be seen!

name: Jennifer Simmons
text: Love Dr Voss! Wait times have been long in the past but my last two appointments have been very quick.

resp.text: We are always improving and growing to accommodate wonderful people like you. Thank you for your honest comment.

name: Shametrice Barnett
text: Although Dr. Torrence is my OBGYN I've had the pleasure of seeing Dr. Voss as well. Dr. Torrence has been my physician for over 10 years and I must say she is very attentive, through, and nothing short of amazing. If you're looking for someone to tell you what you want to hear or look at you as just a "number" Dr. Torrence ISN'T THE DOCTOR FOR YOU!! The main thing I admire about Dr. T is the fact that she's genuinely concerned about her patients. I also like if you have any issues and you make Dr. Torrence AWARE she does everything in her power to make it right. The entire staff is phenomenal and truly care about their patients! :)

name: Hannah Staples
text: I had such a great experience with Ladies First. Dr. Voss delivered my son who decided to come 6 weeks early, and she made my birthing experience peaceful and at ease while I was worried about my baby boy coming early.

resp.text: Thank you so much for those kind words! We appreciate you Hannah.

name: Melissa Whigham
text: I will begin by saying Dr. Torrence is a very good doctor but she does not manage her time well.  I got to the office as requested 15 minutes before (2:45) my appointment (3:00).  I was called back to see the doctor at 4:35.  I walked out of the office at 4:50.  Not once did Dr. Torrence apologize about my wait time.  It shows a lack of respect for the patient when you have them wait for 1 1/2 hour for an appointment. This is not the first time this has happened.

resp.text: Dr Torrence is no longer with us at LadiesFirst. We appreciate your business and would like another chance to care for you if you would like to visit us again.

name: Abby Mcneil
text: Run as fast as you can . Long long wait times . Rude nurses . I was crammed in an area with other people to have my weight and BP checked (which should be private) went on a rant saying I need to be checked for diseases even though I’m married ‘because I’m young and there could be risky behavior’  , which was really a slap in the face and embarrassing to me. I left in the same situation I was in before , just $80 less in my pocket and pretty shocked

name: Yvonne Kovalchick
text: I love this office and staff! I have been using their Med Spa services for over a year. Christy is amazing and so informative. Dr Voss is so sweet she really cares about her patients. She has given me cosmetic injections... Botox and Juvederm. She takes her time and really listens to me, carefully addressing my concerns and meeting my expectations. Christy has given me facial treatments, she always makes me feel special. I like knowing that my concerns are their concerns. I would highly recommend Ladies First. ❤

resp.text: Thanks so much!! We appreciate your support of our business and your kind words.  Always let us know how we can serve you better. ♥️♥️

name: Sophia Sage
text: In 2015 I had my son with these doctors. I had previously gone here for my female checkups and had a lovely Dr. When I returned to have my son my Dr. Had moved her practice and I took another one. From day one my new dr. Was looking down her nose at me and generally fat shamed me every chance she got. Being a first time mom I was scared and followed what ever I had been told to the letter. I was given countless tests and had more than a few "inconclusive" results with preeclampsia. In the end I was induced before my due date due to an inconclusive movement test and ended up with an emergency c-section that took me months to bounce back from. For even 2 years after I've suffered from crippling pain in my abdomen. Muscle weakness. In general a longer than 'normal' recovery time. To further the issue a couple of weeks ago I tried to get a check up here to remove my IUD and the nurse was so loud pushy and rude on the phone about discussing my insurance over the phone before I could even make an appointment made me just give up completely. I won't be going back to this place ever again. I don't trust them and from the other reviews I've seen on here, you should reconsider trying them.

name: Asha Voss
text:
I am posting a review of my own practice to not just celebrate over 20 years of private practice in a very difficult healthcare economy and environment but also to celebrate more importantly and MOST importantly my incredible employees who have remained loyal and stunningly amazing. They are the greatest people around. For those who do not appreciate their diligence and hard work I encourage you to take your negative comments elsewhere - as you have absolutely no idea how hard they work and what their stressors are in all parts of their lives. As for my Aesetician - we work together as a team we will always work together as a team as that has always created the most beautiful outcomes for our patients.
Doctors who rush through bruising injections do not create the elaborate beautiful outcomes that I have with Christy - who has achieved the status of master aesthetician- and who spends time understanding the contours and the nuances of need and translating them to me as we work as a team.  This is precise injecting work that I am trained and certified to do - as well as an artistic level of teamwork that I don’t think anyone else achieves especially around this region and therefore anyone who criticizes us has no understanding of what we really do and possibly intends us harm  and ill wishes - which is a very sad (and abysmally low) method of demanding a refund.

We adhere to the strictest guidelines in hygienic standards and we have some of the most creative combinations of med spa packages that are unlike any around as we are not just any MedSpa but we are gynecologic med spa and we have everything female just for you and more ;)

Please take some of the negative comments below as encouragement for us to get better especially with our waiting room time -we run into obstetrical emergencies and take immaculate care of our patients and apologize in advance for waiting room misfortunes. We are constantly taking these as constructive criticism for us to get better as negative as they may seem.

However I do take exception to one very negative comment below as you will see I believe this person has reflected more of her own self explanatory emotional disabilities than anyone else’s. I truly think her calling herself a freak is more of her own reflection of what she has always seen and her obvious lack of self love - areas of improvement I would assume.

name: Margo Battenberg
text: Dr Voss has been my provider for 6 years.  It is always a pleasure to see her.  Dr Voss truly loves her profession and it is felt in her care.  She provides up to date procedures and has added esthetics!  What a great adjunct to help each woman feel their best.  Dr Voss, thank you for being your upbeat, positive self.  You are loved and appreciated!  I highly trust and recommend Ladies First!

resp.text: Thank you !

name: Brittany Galland
text: The people at this facility have no personality. No one is friendly, no one smiles at you, and it certainly doesn't make you feel any less awkward when you're getting your lady bits examined. Definitely will be finding a new gynecologist.

name: Vickie Smith
text:
I've never seen such poor doctors in my life!
When you have a patient in the hospital bleeding a good doctor wouldn't want to release, but Voss & Torrence tried to.

name: Alyson Aplin
text: Dr. Torrence and her staff are amazing!! They go above and beyond for their patients!! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: lianna mejia
text: My friend is pregnant and goes their she says that were good in the beganing but when she went to her appointment when she was suppose to they were closed. now she can't get them on the phone even when they say are open till 5 Monday thru Friday.

name: Common Sense
text:
Have seen DR Voss for 5 years.  She is always  professional,cheerful,
helpful and informative. Personally work in health care and find there phone, front desk , and room staff courteous and helpful. Wait times are compatible with my other providers, family doctor and specialist. I bring a book or read  the magazines provided. Thank you Dr Voss and Ladies First for providing female  Ob and Gyn services

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Trey Jackson
text: My name is Latoya Nunnally. I have been going here for a few months now and I love it. My doctor is Dr. Torrence and she is simply amazing.I would recommend her to anyone. There are so many negative reviews on here but to each his own because I am very hspph with my doctor and will continue going.

name: eraisys herrera
text:
Honestly Pam Jones and Dr. Voss are the best!!
Update: Oh my god I have to say it again. These doctors are the best. I gave birth the 28th of December and Dr. Voss is such a sweet person and so understanding. She literally went to my room after giving birth everyday to check on me .

resp.text: Thank you so very much!

name: Azucena Hernandez
text: Had a wonderful experience over the phone very helpful and informative !Very friendly !

resp.text: Thank you for your kindness!

name: Jennifer Lee
text: Terrible wait time. Expect to be there for 3 hours or more for a pap smear. My appointment was at 8am (which is when they open). I was third to be seen. At 9:40 I still had not seen dr. Voss. At 9:52 I was seen by the dr, then went for lab work and checked out at 10am. Needless to say the exam was very quick and I didnt have an opportunity to discuss my concerns. Would not recommend.

name: Anna Manley
text:
This place is ridiculous. They prescribed a low dose birth control pill that they knew had reduced effectiveness on overweight women, I am pretty noticeably overweight, and wouldn't give me a straight answer when I asked about it several times. I kept having to play phone tag with the nurse when I was redirected to her line; yet, whenever I got fed up and asked the phone operators to get the nurse, she was there in seconds. All of this after being prescribed a birth control I didn't want that was in such high doses almost everyone on it had side effects.
Besides the never ending phone tag, the waiting times are insane majority of the time. I went to get the last shot in a 3 part series to help prevent cancer, just a shot, never had to see the doctor, anyone could give it to me, but I had to wait TWO hours. They were not full, it wasn't even half full, I just waited while so many people who arrived after me went first. It took a minute or less for that shot. And yes, I had an appointment.
If you value your time or your respect, just find somewhere else.

name: Becky Gavin
text:
I love Dr. Voss but the wait times are just absurd. I’ve never waited this long at a doctors office. Usually wait times are 1-2 hours. Sometimes more than that. The lobby is never crowded, the back doesn’t seem busy. No one is in hurry here.
***Editing my review after my LAST appointment with Dr. Voss.
Coming from someone who has worked in healthcare for eight years, this office is poorly managed. The staff doesn’t care because the Doctor’s don’t care. Simple as that. Ladies, steer clear of Ladies First.

resp.text: Thank you for being a patient of Dr. Asha Voss. We apologize for the long wait time. Sometimes delivery calls our physicians to the hospital. We appreciate your patience when these situations arise.

name: Donna DeVane-Trippe
text: Let me start by saying that I love Dr. Torrence, but the lack of time management has completely done me in. I have had 6 visits in the last year and each time I have had to wait 2 to 2-1/2 hours. One visit i was forgotten about (sitting in the exam room). the next visit 3 patients had the same appt time of 330. When i complained about the long wait times the nurse told me to make early morning appointments.  So my next 2 appointments were the very 1st ones. Both times Dr. Torrence didn't even show up until 45 minutes to an hour after my scheduled appointment. Needless to say I am done. My time is just as valuable as theirs.

name: Sheena Guettler
text: I recently had twins and Dr. Torrance is my doctor.  I would recommend anyone seeking a practical, thorough obgyn to see Dr. T. The nurses and staff have always been courteous. My usual wait time is around 30 minutes.

name: JA Cole
text: Dr. Voss is wonderful. She always takes a lot with me and explains everything! Very knowledgeable and caring!!!

name: Bethany
text: I saw Dr.Voss a few days ago to start a new birth control as a new patient. After reading all the horrible reviews online,I was a little hesitant about keeping my appointment but,decided to proceed and give it a chance. Upon arriving walking in at 11:00am my appt. was at 11:15am, I was a little confused by all the dermatology products and was unsure I was in the correct building until I asked the receptionist who was very polite and helpful. After filling paperwork out for a new patient visit,I was asked to urinate in a specimen cup. I went to the bathroom,sat my cup in the lab window however,I noticed about 6 other cups full of urine with patients names labeled on them as I also work in the medical field,I thought this was VERY dirty and also a HIPPA violation,I proceeded anyways. I was called to the back fairly quickly,there was only one other patient waiting. I was sat down for the nurse to get vitals,then told to sit at the chairs near the lab until I was called. I waited there about 30mins. The nurse then took me to the exam room, as I sat there for at least another hour maybe a little more. I became anxious but,tried to be patient. Dr.Voss walked in,she was very polite however,I felt as soon as she come in and I gave her my reason for seeing her she was showing me all these brochures about weight loss and dermatology products. I weigh 100lbs.,I was not interested in any of this but, listened. She spent about 20mins or so in the room with me she explained everything in great depth and reassured me questions that I worried about were nothing to be concerned about. I then got dressed,went to check out,which was 2:00pm. I had a good experience other than the urine in the bathroom and the long wait time. It wasn't a horrible experience but,I suggest they change some things. I also was concerned that my last period was in February and it is now June,no pregnancy test was done nor was could you pregnant asked, that is a major concern for me even though I knew the answer they didn't seem to ask.

name: Erica Hamilton
text: was talked down to and treated like I didn't matter at all. And since I don't have steady transportation to appointments they found it necessary to make me feel even lower by lecturing me every time I go to the hospital or call their office. I have several severe issues going on with my pregnancy, and I'm not heartless, so OF COURSE I WANT prenatal care!! But not all of us have the money to pay for rides and it is way too far to walk to the office. In my opinion they need SOMEONE there that can identify with the less fortunate and not just cater to those that have everything readily available!

name: Jenna Enfinger
text: Literally the slowest dr office I have ever been to. I waste my whole day here everytime I have an appointment. Their communication skills with their patients also aren't very good.

name: galaxy- king
text: I'm so confused on the negative reviews.... Doctor Torrence is amazing she is always smiling and friendly.... She has preformed a C-section on me twice and I've survived thus far I trust her with my life..... I get the wait times but I believe they are short staffed and births are pretty unpredictable so while it's frustrating on the receiving end of long wait times I understand that if I was in labor I'd want MY doctor to be available.... Maybe they will figure out a better way to handle this in the future..... The nurses and assistants are great always friendly to me and so is the receptionists, the lady who draws blood is as sweet as can be and the same with both ultrasound techs..... I only met doctor voss once at the hospital but she seemed very kind amd took the time to talk to me...I juat adore this whole practice.... Sometimes you have to check people out leaving these bad reviews maybe it's them.with the bad attitudes.... Some of these reviewers give 5 stars to Wendy's, and McDonald's but write a bad review for a busy doctors office I'm not buying it at all.... Probably didn't get there own way is more like it

name: Jessica M
text:
I went for a check up because most sources say you should start going around the age of 16. Nothing was wrong, but I am 20 and thought I was behind. When I arrived, I filled out the paperwork and waited (total time of about an hour). When I saw the doctor she told me I didn't need to do anything until I was 21 and unless I was having problems I didn't need to have anything done. I drove an hour and paid $40 to have someone tell me I didn't need to be there. They asked me my age and if I was having any problems when I made the appointment, so it should have been avoided.

I gave them 3 stars because everyone was really friendly and the facility was very clean.

name: C Moff
text: Very polite staff.  They listen to you.  I love it there.

name: Ashlee Preston
text: The nurse that took my vitals had no personality not real friendly. Been waiting over an hour.. People have to get to work do they not think of that. Why do they make appointments if they dont follow them really

name: Kristen Guidry
text: If you're bored and have all the time in the world this is the right place. If not , I suggest you find somewhere else to go.

name: Alexis Bastidas
text: Worst service ever. Three hours waiting to being seen by the doctor with appointment.

name: c.j. mato-toyela
text: Won't call back after multiple attempts to get in touch.

name: Brittany R
text: I had my daughter with Ladies 1st over 13 years ago. Dr. Torrence was fantastic and the experience was great. When we moved back to the area, I was so excited to return for the same experience. HAH! Should've known better. Dr. Torrence seems to be the only capable staff member, which means you wait for 3+ hours for OB appointments. As I had a child to take care of, I couldn't do that. So I switched to Dr. Voss. Biggest mistake of my life. I tore with a 6 pound baby. So when my 9 pound baby shot out like a freaking rocket because she kept turning up the pitocin, you can only imagine the aftermath. When I went to my 6 week checkup, I asked her why she didn't give me a c-section to begin with since my son was measuring huge, she told me that I was crazy with hormones and if I spoke to her like that again, we'd have to involve lawyers. I immediately switched to Dr. Heim whom when he saw the size of my son could not believe that I had him vaginally. These women are running a chop shop and I'm not sure why they are the first practice that Tricare refers to. I'm guessing it's probably because they need the business once people realize how shady they are. Do your research and AVOID, AVOID, AVOID!!!!!

name: kelsey mardis
text: Sadly, I have to agree with all of the other negative reviews. My appointment was at 1:00, I got there at 12:20, and didn't get called back until almost 2:30. I met with my Doctor for 2 minutes (literally) and she had to leave to go to the hospital. No biggie, but the way the other nurses handled the situation pissed me off. They popped in 10 minutes after she left to tell me that someone would be with me in 15-20 minutes! After I already waited almost 2 hours to be seen. I got up and walked out. The customer service was HORRIBLE. I called my insurance and changed doctors immediately.

name: Alexis Boykin
text: They are the slowest . Had an appointment at 9:45 got there at 9:30 because they ask you to be there 15 minutes early for paperwork. I literally walked out of that place at 1:40 and all I was only getting was a freaking pap and breast exam that took all of 5 minutes ! Will not be going back

name: Salman Imtiaz
text: Too too much wait time...its third time that we had to wait 2 long hrs before dr. Came to see us for 5 mins even though we had appointment and the nurses just kept on saying 5 mins every time we asked...poor service and waste of time and at the end dr. Came in hurry just for 5 mins...

name: Nate (NateDog)
text: The wait times are too long. Dr.  Voss is incredibly rude. They have no respect for anyones schedules.  They dont want to work with people that have transportation issues.  I have never been talked to so disrespectful by a dr in my life.  She refused to give me the ultrasound that i know i am due for Because I verified with another obgyn that my insurance does cover it at this set week in my pregnancy. She was very nasty to me and to make it worse in front of my children.

name: Cinnamon Clarke
text: I've been going to ladies first off and on for the last couple years, and the experience has been pretty ok in the pass...but today I seen doctor Voss and I can honestly say this was my last time coming here...she made me feel like she was not caring, she was trying to hurry and get to the next patient, and just didn't have the best attitude,  I didnt feel like she really cared about what I felt day to day....however I love doctor candice short, she is awesome! She has a heart and understands what ppl go threw...And if I did recommend anyone to go here it would be to see doctor candice short ❤..but I would not reccomend doctor Voss,  i dont think she really cares

name: Paige Dewberry
text: Absolutely horrible. They made me change my appointment from August 22 to the 28th cause of their dr and I’ve been waiting an hour since my appointment time to even get out of the stupid waiting area. They have no concept of time and that some people do not take off a full day for a morning appointment.

name: Ashley Lamb
text: I wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy.  I feel bad giving them 1 star.  I saw Dr. Raines who I don't believe is there anymore (I wonder why).  I can't speak for all the women that work here but the ones that I encountered came across as very  condescending.  I felt very uncomfortable.  Dr. Raines didn't seem to listen or act like she wanted to answer my questions.  I would see her in the back while they were taking my vitals and she wouldn't  even speak to me. I'v heard several horror stories about this place and am very surprised they are still in business. They told me they would mail my yearly pap smear results.  I never received them and had to call to find out.  They then told me that I had to come in for the results like something was wrong.  I came in and had to pay another copay.  Then Dr. Raines proceeds to ask me why I am there.  Really??!!  Then she says my results were fine.  In my opinion, it was like they wanted another copay from me. I now see Dr. Scott at Women's Medical Center and he is the best.  He has been a blessing to me and it is such a relief to have a DR that sincerely cares.  Come to find out I had a large cyst on my ovary that had to be surgically removed and have PCOS which they never detacted. I recommend you go elsewhere.  And if you read the reviews for this place, I am not the only one!

name: Sonny Gilbert
text: The lady at check in is rude....we are currently sitting here waiting to be seen...coming up on a 1hr....got here 45 mins early and still waited a hour past my wifes appointment....asked the lady upfront what was going on and the only response was ill see....no response back...so really rude and dis courteous staff....

name: lunarxraindrop
text: Definitely not doing business here again!

name: Bebstee b
text: Im 31 years old and pregnant with my first child. Im currently seeing Sharon Bush but i will be finding somewhere else to go. Its almost as if she is looking down on you the moment she walks into your room. The place has treated me like im nothing more than a waist of their time. I would encourage any first time mothers to go somewhere else. Rude staff and cold hearted physician. *update* being that I was so far along I decided to stay with Ladies First. I will never use them in again. At six months I began having pain in my lower back hip and leg. I called the office countless time and mentioned it to Dr. Bush and her nurse only to be treated like I was a bother. it took me being seen by Dr. Malone (while Bush was on vacation) to learn that I was having sciatic nerve issues. Dr. Malone said she would recommend Bush set me up with physical therapy. I mentioned physical therapy to Bush at my follow up appointment only to be told" I never heard of pregnant women doing physical therapy". Then out of nowhere I received a phone call from a therapy center letting me know ladies first had sent a referral *tada* three weeks before my due date. I went to one appointment and the therapist was shocked that they waited so late to finally send me and stated that there was not much (if anything) they could do for me. not to mention that it was not safe for me to do physical therapy do far into my pregnancy. on the day of my due date I went in for my check up. I told the medical assistant that I was having minimal fetal movement she just said ok and left the room. Bush came in assessed me and we discussed induction. I left the office only to be call back to return. When I spoke to Bush She said that she was unaware that I told the medical assistant a having minimal movement from my baby. (do they not communicate with one another??) I was sent for a BPP an was informed that I would be induced that day due to low amniotic fluids. these women for the receptionist to the nurse practitioners to the physicians care nothing about their patients. I would not recommend this place to my worse enemy.

name: Amanda Brockway
text: I am due with my first baby in 3 weeks, I have been seeing Dr. Voss and Lisa Gowan....and amazing midwife...at their Enterprise office my entire pregnancy.  The doctors, nurses, staff, and midwife are friendly, professional, and knowledgeable.  I am absolutely in love with Lisa Gowan, she provides amazing care, takes time to answer all of my questions, and innovative with her practice.  I am fortunate enough to be a part of her new group care classes that she recently started.  Once a month pregnant women, at all stages of their pregnancy, get together to discuss important information and stages of pregnancy (like nutrition, exercise, and changes in your body, experiences, and concerns).  They teach you to take your own blood pressure, Lisa measures your belly and listens to the baby's heartbeat, we sit down and talk as a group for about 2 hours, oh and did I mention free food and snacks?!?! It doesn't get any better for a pregnant lady's doctor appointments :).  It is really a great opportunity to network with other pregnant women and form a support network.  I only wish she could deliver my baby, she is working on getting approval to deliver in the Wiregrass...just won't be done in time for my little one.  I have enjoyed my health care with this group of doctors and I hope you do too.

name: Ashley Andrews
text: dr Voss and all the nurses have taken great care of me during My last surgery and have taking the time to explain exactly what to expect during my upcoming da Vinci hysterectomy I love then all and highly recommened I had not been to an ob since I was 18 and I'm 35 and she was very gentle she could sense my nervousness and they kept my husband up to date while I was in surgery so he wouldn't b worried. you won't b ashamed if u give them a try thank you dr Voss and entire staff

name: Bee Tee
text: Best doctors. Friendly service.

name: LaNae Allen
text: It should be called money first. They don't care about their patients, they only care about their wallets.

name: Carolyn FRANCO
text: Love there service

name: New Generation
text: Disrespectful and the wait is to long

name: Danna Britt
text: Wonderful

name: kandace granade
text: My sixteen year old daughter went for a consultation with her father. I then schedule the follow up appointment thinking they would do the correct procedure. After doing the wrong procedure they still charged us. When ask for them to apply the money to the correct procedure they said she signed a consent form and they told her in detail what they were going to do. Abviously they have enough money not to care for their patients. My daughter has been going there since she was two. I highly recommend going somewhere else. Only giving a two so others can see this post.

name: Patricia Long
text: I went to see Dr. Ramagosa for the first time today to have fillers above my lips and on the corners of my mouth. He was so professional and nice. His Assistant,  Hanna came in beforehand to explain the procedure to me. She, as well, was very professional but super nice in answering all of my questions. I would highly recommend Sunrise Dermatology!

name: Jenika Monroe
text: Dr. Ramagosa is a great doctor but his office staff at both locations are horrible.  I had an appointment on May 11, 2021 with Dr. Ramagosa where he put me on a new medication the medication requires insurance approval and his nursing staff never sent the prescription in!  I called them back a month later 06/10/2021 to find out what was going on and she gave me a bogus story, sent the prescription but sent the incorrect one.  I called back the next day 6/11/2021 to try to get things straight and the nurse had another LIE...She stated I was sent home with samples (which i was not) that's why the particular prescription was sent in.  Today is 06/23/2021 and they still have not sent in the correct prescription so that I may receive my medication and at this point I have not any had any medication in 2 months.  On top of that I received a letter being dismissed from the practice because I expressed how I felt about Dr. Ramagosa's nurse Samantha lying about my records and care.

name: Drexel Fields
text: They are the best at what they do. I highly recommend them.

name: Debbie Woodyard
text:
Love Sunrise Dermatology. Staff and physicians are great. Multiple locations for easy access. They always take time to answer all of my concerns
Very professional and timely. Would highly recommend.

name: Steve Scroggins
text: Pleasant atmosphere. Friendly staff. Safe environment. Professional services. Expert surgery. Pleased with results. Would recommend to anyone. Indeed have done so.

name: Nancy Smith
text: Everyone at Sunrise Dermatology is so nice from the receptionist to the check out clerk. Melissa Williams NP is extremely knowledgeable and truly cares about me as a patient. I will continue to use them and look forward to my next visit.

name: Carol Ann George
text: I highly recommend Sunrise Dermatology.  The doctors, nurse practitioner's, and all staff are wonderful.  The best dermatologists!

name: Larosia McKenzie
text: I like the way that the staff take the time to show genuine interest and concern for me from the time I’m placed in a room ; up until checkout. I highly recommend this facility to anyone in need of a dermatologist that listens and execute professional service.

name: Becky Hood
text: The people were so efficient and friendly! This will definitely be my dermatologist office of choice from now on! Melissa Williams, FNP, is excellent! I highly recommend them!

name: Amelia Kornegay
text: I have never felt more comfortable and relaxed. The staff is amazing very informative about all products and procedures.  Highly recommend this practice!

name: Jackie Bentley
text: Not only do I see Dr. McKay, but my daughter does as well. She is so sweet and gentle, and friendly. She gets it and understands. She listens and speaks clearly. Highly recommend her,  but her staff is also top notch. Nice, friendly, work efficiently, and helps so much! Thank y’all

name: gary sullins
text: Outstanding group from Dr. Freeman to his nurses and receptionist. Very professional and very timely

name: Margaret Guess
text: I love all of the crew with Dr. Freeman they are the best ! I have always been treated with nothing but being professional and girls are wonderful they talk to you... and  help you understand what's going on. I would not go anywhere else but to doctor Freeman's office ! He is the BEST DR.for your skin problems.

name: handbells512
text: Staff is very friendly, efficient and helpful. I am so glad to discover this dermatologist and would highly recommend them. Thank you all for accommodating me!

name: Burl Phillips
text: I suffered from the most hideous plaque psoriasis you can imagine, literally like some body horror you'd see at the movies.  After visiting Sunrise dermatology in just a month i was cured completely,  and not a single recurrence, and that's been 6 years ago.

name: Doug Conner
text: This is a great place if you have skin problems of any sort go see Dr Ryan Ramagosa. He and his staff are excellent.

name: Tom Boggs
text: Dr. Freeman and his staff are fantastic!  Caring, professional, and they take the time to explain every detail. I couldn’t be more pleased.

name: Ronnie Adams
text: Dr Ramagossa is awesome and his staff were very friendly and helpful. Very relaxed atmosphere, you will fell very comfortable while waiting to see the doctor.

name: Alabama Sighthound Adoptions
text: The team was quick to take me back to an exam room. The clinical team was polite, explaining the diagnosis and treatment. The MD checked out the reason for the visit, as well as other less “problematic” concerns. Two thumbs up across the board!

name: Rene' Savell
text: Doctor ramagosa and his staff are top notch. Recommend to anyone who needs a good dermatologist

name: Kathy Beasley
text: I saw Melissa Williams and she is very professional and takes care of what you need to have done in a timely manner without a lot of follow up appts.  I did not have to wait long in the waiting room either.

name: Diane Browning
text: Dr Scot Freeman and his staff are the greatest.  Dr. Freeman makes you feel so at ease while in his office. He’s an excellent physician and perfectionist with his surgeries.

name: Joyce Goodman
text: I had a great visit to Sunrise dermatology. Even though I had several issues, the provider stopped the world and took care of all of my needs. Thank you Sunrise dermatology for a great visit!

name: Donald Howell (Duck)
text: Nice pleasant aappointment. Doctor was very thorough and explained everything in understanding details. I had no problems and was told I was good for another year. Made an appointment for 1 year later.

name: Brenda Sealy
text: The entire staff was so courteous and helpful.  Dr. McKay was professional, thorough, she explained everything, and I felt completely comfortable.  I highly recommend Sunrise Dermatology!

name: Annabelle Archey
text: Sunrise is awesome, very thorough! I used them for two years now I take my son for his eczema, we are very pleased! Highly recommend!

name: Barbara Davis
text: Professional, compassionate, thorough, and quick service. I think he’s the best in town!

name: Joshua Forbes
text: Very friendly atmosphere Dr. McKay took the time to answer any questions I had and gave me a thorough exam would highly recommend

name: stephanie beasley
text: Dr. Ramagosa was awesome!!! He explained in thorough details what my issues were. I'm excited to see the outcome.

name: jyl hughes
text: Dr Ramagosa is knowledge, friendly and gets you in and out fast!

name: Pelly Davis
text: Dr. Ramagosa was very informative and staff was very friendly and helpful!

name: tikita away
text: My first been seen yesterday was a great experience.

name: Robert McDonald
text: I had seen a dermatologist at another clinic as well as an allergist about my extremely itchy rash but couldn’t find a definitive cause. Within minutes Dr Ramagosa saw I had eczema that I never had before in 56 years. After a few trials with medication and creams, I am finally itch free!  Thanks

name: Jennifer Carr
text: The office staff is rude and always have been. We have been going to this office for several months. I took off work early to take my son for his appointment. The woman at the front desk seemed annoyed and short tempered as usual. We were 30 minutes late because there was a wreck on the highway that congested the Dauphin street exit. Nothing I could fix. They would not see my son. I tried to call to let them know that we would be late due to an accident, but, as usual, no one answered the phone. I left work early, spent over an hour in the car to get there and they would not see him because we were late due to a traffic accident. We will definitely find a new dermatologist!

name: Ariane McWilliams
text:
Melissa Williams is the best Dermatologist ever. She has gone over and beyond to get my daughter's and I the best treatment regimen for each of our specific situations. Go see her you will not be disappointed.

I spoke prematurely. The office staff sucks along with Dr Ramogosa. I wasn't his patient but he dismissed myself as well as my daughter bc I inquired about a no show fee I shouldn't have received.

name: Marian Warner
text: I love Dr. Ramagosa! He is very professional, thorough and takes his time with my preventative skin checks. His staff is always very nice. It doesn’t take months to get an appointment and the wait time in the office is always minimal.

name: Tara Crawford
text: The PA froze off a wart. It became infected and swollen. Now I have a nickel size scare on my leg. Worst experience i

text: In and out quickly. Great rapport with Dr. Ramagosa.

name: Jessica Marshall
text: Fantastic!! I took my 16 month old here and the staff was incredibly polite, sweet and very understanding of small children. My toddler and I were called back right on time, which is such a blessing when you're wrestling with a tiny person to sit still in the waiting area. We only waited 1 minute before Melissa William's came in. Melissa William's was amazing and she was able to keep the visit very quick but it didnt feel rushed at all. I felt like she fully addressed the issue and sent us on our way in a very timely manner. Again, very important with a 16 month old and I'm sure very important to someone who has to return to work. I will be returning here and will highly recommend! ! The only issue I had was that there was no fold down changing station.

name: Hunter Jennings
text: I’ve been going to Hanna at Sole Med Spa for years now. I received my first microdermabrasion and chemical peels here and can’t imagine going anywhere else. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable on everything skincare related!

name: Mary-Katherine
text: Very unhappy with my experience and will never go back. On my first visit the doctor seemed very rushed. He did not ask a single question. He prescribed a lotion that caused a reaction. While I do not blame them for the reaction, the way it was handled once the rash breakout occurred was ridiculously. It took 7 hours for a nurse to call me back. During this time, they did not have a time available for me to come in despite the reaction continuously spreading. Once I finally received a call back they felt no need for me to come in despite my concern. The solution was to put some cortizone you can get at any drug store. They also stated the bumps I incurred probably wouldn’t clear up completely. The rash like breakout was extremely concerning and it is troubling they would not be concerned with a breakout they caused. The fact the solution wouldn’t completely resolve the issue caused by their prescription is unacceptable. It appears they are more concerned with the volume of patients then the actual treatment of their patients.

name: Victoria Godwin
text: Great staff very professional

name: Walt Sanders
text:
One of the finest Docs I have had in a long time.  Knowledgeable, kind and great bedside manner.
Follow his directions and recovery will be fast with minimal pain.  The Bham area should be honored for a physician of his caliber.  His staff are far above the rest I have used elsewhere.

name: Dawn Monaco
text: I had my first appointment with him today. The office was very clean and everyone was very friendly and knowledgeable.  I am shocked that Dr Hunt took over a hour to sit and talk to me. You don’t have many Doctors that do that anymore.  He knows his work and I’m grateful my wound Dr set up the appointment for me. I know that with Dr Hunt I will finally be on the road to recovery.

name: Beverly Nelson
text: Best Surgeon,  Best care, Extremely clean, Helpful & knowledgeable staff.

name: Ginny Franks
text: It isn’t cheap, but the relief the IV Therapy cocktail provided is well worth the cost. Will definitely do again.

name: Hickory Homestead
text:
If you are looking for a great way to perk up your energy and get your head out of the fog then look no further, you have found the place!  The IV cocktails are great and make you feel like a million bucks. The memberships are great, the people are sweet and the recliners are very comfy.  Move over energy drinks You’ve gotta love the B12 Lipo shots for a great boost of energy.
I was just in a few days ago and the nurse on staff was very professional and courteous.  I’m using the High dose Vitamin C as an alternative cancer therapy with great results!   I recommend Hydralive Therapy highly!

name: Savannah Bunt
text: Had a wonderful experience!! The staff was beyond friendly and so helpful in helping me pick a cocktail! I was trying to kick some long lasting effects from COVID and the IV did me wonders of good! I don’t feel like a zombie just making it through the day anymore!! Will definitely be back!!

name: Casey Gillespie
text: I suffered from severe dehydration after a long, hot day outdoors.  I went in to get rehydrated with additional vitamins.  It was quick and easy.  It made me feel much better afterward. Highly recommended!

name: JoEllen Brown
text: My last visit was in November before a 26.3 mile hike. I am always comfortable and know I will be taken care of. The staff is always friendly and helpful. I will be back!

name: Marcie Foster
text: Great experience! Distanced and safe without losing the relaxing atmosphere. Felt so much better afterwards for several days, a week.

name: Kaitlyn Bentley
text: Hydralive is great! It's super convenient, comfortable, and quick! Even if you don't love needles, they make it very calming and also offer other treatments that don't involve needles. It's one of those places that you didn't know you needed until you go - I love it!

resp.text: Thanks for stopping in Kaitlyn! It's our pleasure to make your experience as comfortable as possible so you can get back to feeling 100%. We appreciate your kind words! We hope you visit again soon.

name: Sara Thompson
text: I cannot say enough positive things about this business. The staff are always friendly and very knowledgeable about the products and services. The atmosphere is pleasant and quiet. As an athlete, I take race prep and recovery very seriously; hydralive has the services I need to prepare for any race. I look forward to my next visit.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Sara. We love helping athletes reach their full potential, both before and after races!

name: Pamela Carroll
text: It was a great experience! Lori and Kaley explained everything and was very professional but fun. I would definitely recommend Hydralive!!

resp.text: Pamela, thank you for taking the time to share your experience we us. We feel fortunate to have the staff we do! We hope to see you again soon.

text: My girlfriend and I came in a few weeks ago for b12 shots. The paperwork was quick and simple, there was no wait time, and we were in and out in less than 20 minutes. Will definitely come again.

text: Staff were super friendly and awesome, the hard head cocktail helped get rid of my migraine, and the nausea with it. So much better than waiting at a doctors office in pain, forever. I just walked in and immediately was able to get some relief. So thankful for you guys!

text: My experience with Hydralive Therapy in Birmingham couldn't have been better. I had been wanting to try cryotherapy for a while and decided to give it a chance at Hydralive. When I arrived, the staff quickly walked me through the process and answered every question I had. Since it was my first time, they gave me examples of what some of the regulars do during cryo and that was very helpful. It's a great staff at a great location. I'll be going back.

text: Hydralive Therapy is a safe and healthy way to rehydrate and also with vitamins!! There are many options of "cocktails" to choose from. I also love the Cryotherapy available! resp.text: Hey Danielle! Thanks so much for your kind words. We're just tickled pink you enjoyed your time with us. We hope you stop in again to rehydrate and get your vitamins again soon! 😊

resp.text: We're so glad to hear you've found a treatment that works well for you. Thanks for the kind word, Kasidy.

text: I have a B12 deficiency and was looking for a convenient place to get my weekly shots (the doctor’s office isn’t always quick) and HydralIVe has been exactly that! It’s very convenient, never takes long, and the staff are all friendly, professional and talented!! Highly recommend.

resp.text: We're so glad to hear you've enjoyed your experience at our clinic. Thanks for the five stars!

text: I've tried hydralive therapy several times and have always had a great experience. From cryo to iv treatments this stuff really does work! The staff is always great and I leave feeling refreshed and revitalized every time! I would highly recommended hydralive therapy!!

text: I have had 2 major surgeries in the last year and although I have recovered, I’ve been feeling dehydrated and depleted ever since. Like I’m always playing catch-up but never getting “there”. The services and workers at HydraLive have been the answer. Within 10 minutes of my first visit, I knew this was what my body had been craving and became a member. The staff and nurses are extremely knowledgeable and caring. They offer so many options and customize for exactly what you need/want. The chairs are comfortable and plenty of TVs to watch what you want with the remote in your hand. I am so thankful they are here and highly recommend!

name: jones020493
text: I suffer from an autoimmune illness that causes migraines, nausea, and sometimes other imbalances. Hydralive has been instrumental in helping me control these symptoms. I've gone quite often since March, sometimes preemptively and sometimes in the middle of illness. At either time, this place has saved me a ton of copays and ER visit fees. Not to mention every single time I've walked through their door, they've had some type of discount offered. I wouldn't advise disregarding regular medical care, but I definitely believe in using them as a supplement to help with my healthcare regimen. With all that said, they have some services that I haven't used yet including weight loss and cryotherapy... I'm a loyal supporter.

resp.text: Hi there! We are so thrilled to hear we've been beneficial to you feeling your best. When you're ready, we're open to talking about weight loss and cryotherapy with you. Thank you for your continuous support! We look forward to your next visit.

text: Everyone at Alabama Vein Center were very professional and caring. I cannot say enough good things about Dr Hunt and his entire staff!!
