text: 5 stars is not enough to properly rate the level of care I received here. I went today for my second surgery and still have 1 more to go. I do not tolerate pain very well yet I was surprised it was minimal. The facility is clean, comfortable and beautiful. Dr Hart is knowledge, professional and caring. The best part was my nurse Jodi. I panic when having anything done end she had a way of making me feel safe and secure that I can’t quite explain. I’m beyond for her and Kimberly both who cared for me going above and beyond.

name: Sharon Bailey
text:
Whatever your needs are you will receive the best treatment.
From the time you enter the office until you leave you will get the best care!

name: Jamie Rosser
text: It's not just Hormone  Therapy. It is very personalized. Changed my life.

name: Amanda Bizjack
text: Christina Hunt is an absolute artist. She microbladed my eyebrows and I couldn't be happier with the results. She step by step walks you through how she outlines them and makes sure you're comfortable. She is meticulous and will not let you leave without being absolutely satisfied. I've completed my touchup appointment and she was nothing but amazing during my second visit. I was very nervous to even get the procedure but she eased my nerves and reassured me throughout the entire process. If you're looking for the best, then look no further than Christina. I traveled in from Atlanta and would absolutely say she blows everyone out of the water with her quality of work. 10/10 recommend!

name: Donna Rasmussen
text: I have always had a very positive experience with each visit here & each surgical procedure. Also I continue to have great results from these procedures. I highly recommend Dr. Hunt & his team.

text: This is a top-notch group, in every way. All of the staff, and Dr. Hunt, is the best. I have been both a vein patient and a med spa client for the past 6 years. So glad to have found them!

name: Emily Huffman
text: Everyone that works in the Hoover office are so nice and welcoming. I have always received great care at this location and recommend Dr. Hunt and his practitioners!

name: Becky Smithson
text: The office staff was very pleasant and helpful. Visit was efficient and thorough!

name: Nancy Smith
text: I have used Alabama Vein for as long as I can remember to keep my legs looking good enough to wear shorts and skirts all summer. Everybody there is friendly, professional and very knowledgeable. I highly recommend them.

name: lilmama 44
text: Dr. Hunt and his Staff are wonderful! I was referred to him for venous insufficiency by my primary doctor. I am in the process of getting treatment for the venous insufficiency which has been Fantastic so far. I am also very Happy that Dr. Hunt and his Staff are so knowledgeable about hormones and other health issues; they have set me up with a health plan that will eventually help me with some terrible hypothyroid & menopause symptoms. I am ecstatic that Dr. Hunt understands how important it is for thyroid patients to have optimal levels to feel better. I am overjoyed that my primary physician referred me to Dr. Hunt, I feel like he & his staff are not only are helping me with venous insufficiency issues but also my thyroid and other hormone issues are being addressed and will eventually be at the optimal levels.

name: Tabatha Ross
text: Dr. Hunt was very knowledgeable about my varicose veins and treatment options. I will give another review after I have the procedures.

name: D J

text: The staff was very friendly and helpful. Dr. Hunt and the nurse did an exceptional job of answering my questions and explaining the procedure used to treat varicose veins. I feel very encouraged to expect relief from the pain in my legs! I wish I had gone to see them sooner.

name: Chris Duncan
text: Very thorough evaluation on needs and worked fast to get things moving.

text: Love jamey! I recommend her to everyone

No complications or really much pain -- I'm doing great!  I highly recommend AL Vein & Restoration Medspa for varicose vein treatment.

text: Beautiful facility. Everything was handled well and very satisfied with procedure to get spider veins under control.

text: I got a facial from Jamie and she did AMAZING. The best facial I’ve ever had. So relaxing. Highly recommend and she will be doing all of my facials from now on. Love her!

text: The staff at the Vein Clinic are so nice and friendly! They called and checked on me after my surgery. I have had a great experience there. Dr Hunt is great as well as all of the staff. I highly recommend.

name: madeline bromley
text: I couldn’t ask for better care and nicer people. I recommend them to everyone I know. The entire staff makes you feel at ease. They are the BEST!!!

name: Linda Penland
text: Dr. Hunt is terrific, He took very good care of me and his staff is amazing.

name: Sandy Gann
text: Everyone from the front desk to the people in the procedure room are especially nice and polite. I felt very comfortable the whole time I was there which is not usually the case when having a procedure done. Will definitely recommend to anyone

name: Jimmy E.Webb
text: The staff was kind and courteous. The medical procedure was efficient and effective. I have no complaints.

name: Sharon Bell
text: Dr. Hunt and his staff are awesome and their facility is outstanding!  All are extremely professional and at the same time they couldn't be more pleasant and accommodating.  After two years of swollen legs and feet I was referred to Dr. Hunt who diagnosed me with with Venous Reflux and after several procedures I am well on my way to a complete recovery. At my initial  visit, Dr. Hunt took a lot of time to fully explain my condition and exactly how  it would be treated.  On top of that, Dr. Hunt sent a personal detailed email to me fully explaining Venous Reflux and its treatment. Visit their website to see all the services they offer.  I highly recommend Alabama Vein & Restoration Medspa!

name: Asia Alfred
text: If I could recommend a million times, I would!! Everyone was so kind, from the two ladies at the front desk to Jamie who did my chemical peel! Jamie was very knowledgeable and kept me informed throughout the entire process and made sure I was comfortable.

name: Lorrie Lewis
text: Everyone always makes me feel so welcome and the new facility is absolutely beautiful.

name: Charlotte Bridwell
text: Dr. Hunt is amazing!! he has the most amazing staff, as well!! I have never been to a doctors office, where ALL staff members was extremely nice, caring and helpful. Everytime I had a procedure done, a staff member would call the following day to check on me. name: Cassandra Harris
text: I had vein surgery and everything went well, but the time that they give you to recuperate isn't good.  They say you can go back to work or they give you 1 week to recuperate, and you have to ice and heating pad, how can that be effective when, how is it possible to do that at work. I think the down time should be as long as you have to wear the compression hoses.  Walking can be done at home.  Also dis-appointed that the compression hose can't be purchased throw the office with insurance, because insurance does pay for it...

resp.text:
I'm pleased you were happy with your procedure, however, I'm disappointed you were dissatisfied with the other aspects you mentioned.  Customarily post procedure, most everyone returns to work and daily activities the very next day or two at the latest.  We understand not everyone recovers the same, additional time to to feel back to normal may be warranted.  We would have been more than happy to extend your time off with a work excuse...not a problem at all.  If you experience post procedure discomfort, you are welcome to try heat or ice to the area that is bothering you.  Yes, this would be difficult while at work, this is intended to be done while resting at home.  Compression hose is to be worn for 2 weeks following the ablation procedure.  We want you to resume walking and regular day to day activities within the next day or two at the latest while wearing the compression hose, just not strenuous exercise or running for 2 weeks.  This will aid in your recovery and prevent post procedure swelling plus minimize the risk even further for blood clots.  We don't want you to sit around not moving for 2 weeks, that will only prolong the recovery process.   Compression hose is covered by only 1 of the 50+ insurance companies that we accept....and only on a case by case basis with that one carrier....after we submit your medical records for review by the insurance investigator.  The majority of the time this charge is denied.  We charge the patient for the compression hose up front, if insurance happens to reimburse us for the hose, we will refund the purchase price to the patient immediately.  Unfortunately, this happens only 3-4 times a year.  Some patients attempt to recover the charge on their own by submitting the charge....they are sometimes successful, however, it is only with the one insurance company.  I promise you will receive a reimbursement for the hose if we receive a reimbursement from the insurance company.  Again, I'm terribly sorry you are disappointed.....we would be delighted to meet with you in the office to discuss your concerns.  I appreciate you taking the time to review us....we strive to be a dedicated center of excellence.  Reviews help us improve our patient care and office policy. If we can be of further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at 205.823.0151 or to me directly at the info below.  Have a great day.

Zeke Eldridge
Practice Administrator
zeke@alabamaveincenter.com
direct: 205.716.6050

text: Dr. K. Jackson and his staff at Alabama Surgical Arts were very knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful all the way from the consultation to after the surgery. I had 3 wisdom teeth removed. I may have "babied" my mouth  too much after surgery, but I was back to eat whatever I wanted in 9-10 days. I would highly recommend Dr. K. name: Tracey Canada
text: Alabama Surgical Arts provides a warm and inviting atmosphere. The facility is beautiful, clean, and very spacious. Each staff member I encountered was equally warm, friendly and engaging. A very professional team. Their customer services is top notch! They provide detailed instructions each and every step of the way. Every question I had was answered with a smile, even behind the masks. 😀. Dr. Sami Nazam, II was a joy to have a Doctor. I was extremely nervous, not knowing who I would be seeing on my first visit, but his aura was kind, caring and confident. Upon reviewing my x-rays he quickly observed a new area of concern, which had not been brought to my attention by the referring physicians, and to their credit, it may not have been noticeable on other visits. However, Dr. Nazam reassured me that he would take care of everything. He and his dental/surgical team all have great bedside manners,. They equally helped to put me at ease with their warm, funny and engaging dialogue. Lastly, Dr. Sami personally contacted me the evenings of each procedure, I was pleasantly shocked and excited to have my him call to inquire how I was doing as the pain was intense. He explained what he saw during the procedures, what was done to resolve the issues, what to expect over the next few days, and how to address any concerns I may further encounter.  Wow!!!  His follow-up actions spoke volumes to me, VOLUMES...! 🙏🏽👏🏽🙏🏽   Thank you for making me feel like a part of your family. Awesome, awesome job Dr. Nazam, and the Alabama Surgical Arts staff. 😀😀😀

text: I was very nervous about getting my wisdom teeth out, but the entire staff was very kind and didn’t hesitate to joke and laugh with me to ease my nerves. The doctor/surgeon himself, Dr. Nazim II, personally called my family a few hours after the surgery to check up on me. I would also like to point out that the COVID safety procedures were excellent. The woman at the front desk wiped the form-signing tablet before anyone used it, everyone wore masks and used hand sanitizer, and they separated clean pens from pens that had been used. I wouldn’t have wanted my teeth taken out anywhere but here and I highly recommend Alabama Surgical Arts for anyone, especially people with anxiety like me.

name: Jessie Williams
text:
I visited ASA twice. First time was a consultation with Dr. Sami Nizam and the second was to have several teeth extracted, both top wisdom teeth and a few old crowns that could not be saved. Dr. Nizam is phenomenal! The whole ASA team is amazing! I have dentophobia because of my childhood dentist and they all made me feel very relaxed and calm from the get go.
The day of my surgery, the assistants were so sweet and kind. They had plenty of COVID precautions, as well, so 2 thumbs up! I have had NO pain since my surgery. The bleeding stopped within a few hours and I was able to enjoy some soup later on. My face is a bit puffy, but not as much as I thought I'd swell. The night after my surgery, Dr. Nizam called to check in on me to make sure I was alright. I have stitches in my mouth, but they're not bothersome. He really is an amazing surgeon. Everything took less than an hour. I highly recommend going to Alabama Surgical Arts. Overall, positive experience and they helped me overcome my dentophobia. Thank you Alabama Surgical Arts and Dr. Nizam!!

resp.text: Dentophobia be gone! It was our pleasure.

name: Teresa Knight
text: Dr. Sami Nizam and his staff were absolutely amazing today! They are very professional,  and very personable.  From the time things were scheduled over the phone, the staff took the time to answer all of my questions and that I was completely comfortable with everything going into the procedure.  Once we were actually in the room setting up for the procedure,  the doctor and his staff made sure that I was completely at ease before getting anything started.  Dr. Nizam did a fabulous job placing my IV .... quick and no pain  whatsoever! When I woke everything was explained to me that needed to be followed post surgery.  If anyone needs an oral surgeon,  I would highly recommend seeing Dr. Sami Nizam and his amazing staff!!

resp.text: Thanks for the input. Everything you mentioned are what we try to accomplish. Happy is shows!

name: Brian Edwards
text: Very knowledgeable, experienced, friendly staff did a great job with my dental implant surgery.

name: Velvet Brantley
text:
I visited ASA twice and each time the clerks were warm and welcoming. Excellent customer service. The first vist I had 12 teeth removed , got home at 12p and the bleeding had stopped  by 2p and I was enjoying potato soup. I only took one pain pill as a precaution. Around 6pm Dr Sami called just as he said he would to check on me. The next visit was a year later and nothing about the service or my care changed. I was put under by Dr Sami, with ease left there with stitches in my gum; again very little discomfort my procedure started at 315p I was home by 430p and wide awake by 530p, I took 2 tylenols , had some soup, it was a good day. Dr.Sami called around 6 like clockwork to check on me. He's  really a very nice person and allows  time to ask questions and I love that and when time permits he'll engage in a bit of small talk and his mannerisms is what I find missing and what I miss a lot in some caregivers today. I'm glad he makes you feel like you matter and you're his patient and he's going to take the best care of you.  Yes, I'm a bit long winded but I just want to give Dr Sami and his team the credit they so deserved and
I woke up to a great morning. Thank you Dr.Sami and ASA ❤🌞

resp.text: Thank you so very much. We really try hard to do everything you just put into writing. It was a pleasure. Hope you have a great rest of the week and holiday weekend!

name: Narrae Allen
text:
Husband was sent here to have all of his wisdom teeth removed at once to avoid infection. The office is very nice, VERY efficient (we were in an out within an hour), and the Dr. himself seems attentive, and even called to check in on us that evening. My problem is with the post-op info - or lack thereof - from the nurse who helped my husband to the car.

She handed me a single sheet that mostly covered medication schedules and dietary restrictions, a pack of gauze, and 4 prescriptions. I have no knowledge of how to care for oral postop things, but my mom's a nurse so i know these things can go smoothly or horribly depending on the patient's choices after surgery - behavior that is usually informed by the advise of medical staff, since the general populace is presumably ignorant (safest assumption). I asked if I needed to replace the gauze as soon as we got home, and was about to ask what all he needed to avoid doing. The nurse quickly said, cordially but also sharply such that she cut me off before i could ask, "everything you need to know is written on this sheet" and told me to call if I had questions. Well, long story short he ended up using a straw and doing a few other things I had no idea he wasn't supposed to, because i didn't //know// those were things i needed to ask about, and the sheet made no mention of any of them. I am now unsure how much of his pain is a natural consequence, and how much is our fault. So now we're keeping an eye on, questioning every symptom, which is stressful for both of us. I acknowledge our fault herein but really feel that this all could have been avoided had we been more informed  about restrictions at discharge

resp.text: I am truthfully sorry you feel you were not given explicit instructions. We try to explain every step of the procedure in detail. I personally call every patient to ask if there are any questions the night of surgery. My personal cell phone is on your post op instructions as well. If you have any questions feel free to call me 24 hours a day. I can be available tomorrow morning if you would like me to take a look. The recommended pain control strategies with maximum dosages are listed on the post op instructions sheet if needed. Hope all is well.  -Dr. Nizam

name: Kerri Krilla
text: For over 20 years I suffered from periodontal disease and was a patient of a well respected Periodontal specialist in Philadelphia. During that time, the intent was to keep my teeth and gums as healthy as possible. Regularly scheduled deep cleaning worked. However, my doctor retired and the new staff had different ideas. The regularly scheduled deep cleaning was no longer an option, and within a couple of years my teeth deteriorated to the point where it was embarrassing to even smile. The new staff recommended extractions, at first only a few teeth. Ultimately, they planned to extract all my teeth and do implants. I agreed to have the first three teeth extracted. That was the beginning of a horrible time for me. After the extractions I bled profusely and was in a lot of pain. For two weeks I continued to bleed on and off. I was frightened ,I could not eat, and I was miserable. As time passed it didn't get much better, and I was not myself, as I was normally very outgoing and talkative, but now became very uncomfortable around people. The staff then recommended extracting the rest of my teeth and doing implants. But I was afraid of what might happen after the last experience. I thought, "if I bled so profusely from 3 extractions, how would my body react to all my teeth being extracted". The thoughts going through my head were all scary and uncertain. I sought out other opinions, but did not have a good feeling with anyone. Finally, in late 2016, I met with Dr. Sam Nizam. When we met, I immediately felt the connection, and I was comfortable. Dr. Sam listened to all my concerns attentively. I knew the qualities in a doctor that I was looking for and Dr. Sam had all of them. Dr. Sam sat me down and explained step by step what he recommended and how the procedures would be done. He was so calm and confident, and did not sugar coat anything. He explained that I needed 26 extractions, and why. He explained that I needed bone grafting for the implants to take, where he would need to do the grafting, and why. He explained that I needed a sinus lift, and where and why. Also, he showed me visually on the computer and pointed out exactly where my implants would be placed, to have the best chance of success. He explained how all procedures would be done at the same time. I was still nervous about the whole process, but I had total confidence in Dr. Sam and agreed to schedule it as soon as possible. It was February, 2018. I was in surgery for 5 1/2 hours. He performed all the work that he had explained to me. I went home, knowing I was in good hands and that I was going to be fine. But I was just a little nervous, thinking I might bleed. Dr. Sam prescribed pain killers, which I took that night and went to sleep. I awoke after a peaceful night sleep. My bleeding was the size of a dime!. I had minimal pain. I stopped taking the pain killers. I went back for a follow up. Dr. Sam was pleased with the results and so was I. No pain, no bleeding, the implants (all 11 of them) all took. I now have new teeth. I can smile again. I can speak without fear and embarrassment. At my daughter's wedding I was able to proudly smile and laugh all night! Dr. Sam gave me my life back! I am myself again! Thank you!! I will always be grateful to Dr. Sam for the incredible work he did, that now gives me the chance to enjoy life as I had not been able to do for so long. If I ever have a problem, even though I now live many states away in New Jersey, I would not hesitate to make the trip. I recommend Dr. Sam highly . He has been blessed with a tremendous talent and gift to help people. I wish him all the best,and pray that his success helps thousands more like me in the future. - Linda K

text: Lauren was so personable, amazing, and accommodating! I had been looking for a new waxing place since we moved here a year ago and I'm so sad it took me this long to find this place! It was my first time sugar waxing and I loved it! For sure I will be a forever customer!

name: Jess Ask
text: Today was my first brizillian wax and I couldn’t have picked a better place. I booked Lauren and she could tell how nervous I was. She was so patient with me and encouraged me through the entire process. I was so insecure when we first started, but her kindness made me comfortable by the minute! I HIGHLY recommend this facility and I WILL be seeing Lauren in 4-6 weeks!

name: Tairian Nelson
text: Ellen is phenomenal! I started sugaring six (6) years ago only with Ellen. Never waxed before only sugared. I love it! Unfortunately, I moved to Michigan four (4) years ago and I only want to sugar. I found esthetician’s in Columbus OH, Birmingham MI, and Ann Arbor MI. No one is as amazing as Ellen. When I return home throughout the year to Montgomery AL, I book an appointment with Ellen. Ellen is the best ever!

name: Katie Jo Gossett
text: Very nice and well priced products

name: Crescent Licci
text:
IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A PLACE TO GET A WAX, LOOK NO FURTHER!!
I been going to Ellen for 2 years now, She is a wonderful person and does an amazing job. I would definitely recommend her.  She also has a number to text and a website if you want to make an appointment and responds quickly!

name: Shay
text: I was nervous at first, being that I am a Black woman and a plus size woman. However, when I walked in, Ms. Ellen made me feel so comfortable! She so kind and professional. Lauren is great, too! These are my go-to girls for all my sugaring needs. Lauren saved my life with a last minute service. They're great people and I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Cindy Howard
text: Jennifer Lambert is amazing! She was very helpful, professional, and did a fabulous job! I love the way my eyelashes look now, they went from barely there to luscious, I never want to be without extensions again. I would give her more than five stars if that was an option. LOVED HER!

name: Vernon Blake
text:
Love your new office!

Easy to find and access, plenty of free parking, nice waiting room, and very clean bathroom. Treatment room is clean, uncluttered, organized, private, and comfortable.

For anyone feeling a bit uncomfortable about any of the procedures or her facility, Ellen is very professional, has an excellent bedside manner, and will put your mind at ease.

Her expertise, experience, and passion for what she does is second-to-none!

resp.text: Thanks Vernon!! Everyone Loves my new location! Thanks you for your referral too!

name: Shelley Belly
text:
Thanks for the great Body Sugaring job you did, Ellen. I was a little nervous getting it ALL done but you really made me feel comfortable & I didn't feel nervous or embarrassed!  You are SO easy to talk to. Thanks for answering my million questions about hair removal. ;-).

PS:  your rooms are magnificent!  I felt like I was in a luxury spa (& I've been to a few!). I'll see you again soon. I have already recommended you to all my friends.

Thanks again - so much!

resp.text:
Hello Shelley!

Thank you for taking the time to visit my Google+ page and to leave this wonderful review.

I really enjoyed chatting with you - you were a lot of fun - and I appreciated all the questions you asked.

Intimate hair removal can be daunting for some, I know, so I'm glad that I put you at ease and that you felt comfortable, and are returning to continue with the process of hair removal.

I decorated my rooms myself, so thank you for the compliment!  I, like you, place hygiene and sanitation and cleanliness at the top of my list in my business.

I look forward to seeing you again soon.

Regards
Ellen

name: Lana Grier
text: I was c onfused regarding the various types of professional hair removal techniques. Ellen explained the differences between Electrolysis and Laser hair removal, as well as the advantages of Sugaring over traditional waxing. She was knowledgeable, friendly and patient, answering all of my questions so I could make an informed decision. Very much appreciated!

resp.text: Hi Lana, thank you for the kind review! I never get tired of discussing hair removal techniques. An educated client makes the best customer... it's a win-win! You're not alone regarding your confusion about electrolysis and laser hair removal treatments. I think most people are unaware they are two entirely different technologies, and one is MUCH better than the other... and yes... ELECTROLYSIS is the winner!!!

name: Taneshia Phomsavanh
text: Went here before and recieved amazing service.  Recently tried to book appt. And no one answered or called me back.  Maybe she went out of business.  Idk.

name: Taylor Reece
text: Thanks Ellen for the electrolysis you did on my neck and face. I highly recommend you to anyone. Love not having to shave my 5 o'clock shading constantly and no more razor burn.

resp.text:
Thank you, Taylor, for giving us the opportunity to assist you.  As you know, Electrolysis is the only FDA approved method of Permanent Hair Removal, and we thrilled that you're so pleased with the results.  Thank you, also, for taking the time to share your experience with others so that they too may benefit from professional hair removal.

Hide that razor!  :-)

name: Kimberly Holley
text: I can't rave enough about Lauren!  Super friendly...and super attentive!  I called last minute and she was able to work with my schedule -  although I am not a fan of the "pay by time"...because some people legs are longer than others...whenever I am in town I WILL ALWAYS run to Lauren!  BTW: Ellen is amazing too for electrolysis and sugaring for WOC! Dont say I didn't tell you...

name: Ginger Gams
text: This is the sugarwaxing Queen. I love Ellen. My husband calls her my Sugarmomma.

name: Lynn Daley
text: ""I thoroughly enjoy your hair removal articles about body sugaring and electrolysis. Also, I am now able to make an informed decision when choosing a permanent hair removal method. I look forward to visiting your new salon in Montgomery!"

resp.text:
Hi Lynn

I appreciate that you are visiting my Google+ page and reading my articles.  It's important to understand the types of hair removal methods offered and what they entail.

I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Ellen Dutton

name: Ellen D
text:
Thanks Vernon!!  Everyone Loves my new location!
Thanks you for your referral too!

resp.text: Hi Vernon, Thanks again for sending business our way... we're always happy to receive new clients and make new friends. I've been providing hair removal services in Montgomery for over 10 years now and it never gets old... :-)

name: Tricia Curry
text: Jessica is awesome. She made me feel so toally comfortable in what could have been a awkward situation.

name: Ayana Bell
text: No one answers the phone, I couldn’t even set up an appointment, went to their location and no one answered the door.

name: Destiny Caldwell
text: Great service.

name: Rebecca Brown
text: Called 4 times and left a message once. No one answered and no one called back. Gave them over a week to return my voice mail and nothing.

name: Sara Beasley
text: Lauren was awesome!!

name: Tracy Roberts
text: Victor is truly an artisit!! Best experience i have ever had at a salon. I drive from Cullman to have him work his magic!

name: vkutz
text: Fantastic full service day spa! Excellent staff. Skin Ceuticals, Cosmedix, Jane Iredale, and variety of hair products retail.

name: Laura Farner
text: Best massage ever! Miss Laurie has magic hands. Everyone is extremely nice and professional. I left feeling amazing and can't wait to book my next appointment.

text: Excellent chemical peel.

name: David Gerard Ralson
text: Great place to get my haircut I've been going there for years I'm planning on going for years more. They have other services they offer also because it is a spa

text: Lovely time

name: Greg Howell
text: Very professional. They have a full service medical spa as well as Day Spa. I purchased wonderful gifts for a friend, plus had a facial, microdermabrasion, and a chemical peel over a year period. What a huge difference. La Donna is a joy, and her staff is the best I have found in Northern Alabama. I definitely recommend this Spa!

name: Anita Monk
text: Most unprofessional and inconsiderate doctor's office I have ever come in contact with in my life.  Made 1st appointment, drove an hour to get there and they had no record of my appointment (after giving me directions as to how to get there) once I arrived.  Made a 2nd appointment; they called and changed my time which I explained would push me to get there, was told if I were a few minutes late that it would be okay.  Called them on my way to tell them that there was a car accident on the interstate and that I would probably be 10 minutes late and was told that the doctor would not see me.  Another hour drive for nothing.  They were rude on the phone and actually hung up on me refusing to let me talk to the owner or the practicing doctor.  I will be reporting this place to the Better Business Bureau and will be reporting the doctor as well.  They are a joke!!!!

name: Isabella Sartain
text: Office leaves you feeling... uncomfortable.

name: Tanya Stewart
text: I’m 40 years old and was definitely looking rough. I had micro needling done at a place that apparently did not know what they were doing so I decided to get a consultation for Aquagold at SkinRx. I cannot give enough stars to Dr. Frankel and his wife Clair. Their professionalism was top notch and he was able to notice things with my skin that I hadn’t really paid attention to.  My dark circles and skin tone and texture were my biggest concern and he was able to transform my skin into something that I didn’t believe was possible. They both talked to me the whole time and their ability to make you as comfortable as possible was spot on. I will definitely be going back to them. My skin had never looked this good!!

resp.text: Thank so so much for the glowing review Tanya! Dr Frankel and I had such a great time with you too day, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: B
text: Nice, friendly people. Great experience. We will be back.

name: Darneshia Scott
text: This experience was EVERYTHING! Claudia treated me like royalty! She was extremely knowledgeable! She was very thorough with my facial! Definitely will be returning!

resp.text: Thank you so much Darneshia! It was so lovely getting to see you and your sister today 💕 we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Cindy Neeley
text: Skin RX is beautiful, safe and comfortable. Very, very clean.  My experience was amazing!  The staff and owner are friendly with great hospitality!  My results were beyond my expectations!  Do yourself a favor and pamper yourself soon. Get your skin ready for the holidays!

resp.text: Thank you so much Cindy for your kind words and thoughtful feedback! We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Savie S
text: Normally I would rate this place 5 stars but I feel like I was majorly ripped off earlier this week on an IPL facial. Let me explain, I’ve been coming into this place to get full-face IPL treatments done for about a year. I’ve had three total treatments done in the span of a year. The first two treatments cost me $150. The second time I came in my specialist informed me that the prices will raise to $200 per IPL session. No problem for me, well... I came in earlier this week to get only CHEEKS and CHIN done and she charged me $350$!!! NO ONE informed me it would be that high! Last time I came in I was told $200. $350 for a partial face treatment is absolutely insane price. I’ve been getting these treatments done all over the country and I’ve NEVER had anyone charge me that much for a partial face IPL. Honestly, she should have told me before the treatment that it would be that much! I’ve seen her three times. I didn’t want to make a big deal about it by the time she charged me because I didn’t want to cause a scene but I’m honestly very unhappy with the lack of communication from this business. And what a shame because I really liked this place. ):

resp.text: Hi Savie. We informed you at your last IPL appointment there was a price increase expected. Prior to your next appointment, a year or so later, we left 2 voicemails to be sure you were prepared for the new pricing. I do hope you can find happiness & safe and effective IPL treatments within your budget range somewhere else.

name: Derick and Becky Honore
text: I had a facial done by Kaylee. It felt amazing. She was super friendly, knew what she was doing, and attentive to my needs. My face felt so refreshed when I left. I would definitely recommend! ❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much for your thoughtful feedback!

name: Margo Freeman
text:
DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!  I went to Skin Rx in Madison because the doctor I usually use was going to be out after having surgery.  The girl at the front desk was terribly rude!  Very unprofessional.  Even went as far as to ask me HOW I got an appointment with them...she was the one who made the appointment when I called!!   I was charged $420.00
For Botox and since receiving,  four days later, there are absolutely ZERO signs that I ever got Botox!!!
I have been doing Botox for 10 years...when my regular doctor does it, I see the results the next day!!!
Again...don’t waste your money here!  One star is too much!!

resp.text: Hi Margo. I'm so sorry you did not enjoy your experience at SkinRx. I am the owner of SkinRx, Clair Frankel, and I was the 'girl' at the front desk when you arrived. As with every client who enters our doors, I did try my best to be warm, welcoming and make you feel comfortable. I'm so sorry you did not feel the same and I wish you all the best in your aesthetic pursuits. Botox may take 7 to 10 days to be fully effective.

name: Bless Stonecypher
text: Great place clean and friendly stuff...highly recommended

resp.text: Thank you so much Bless! We look forward to seeing you again soon

name: ninoetz
text: This is a beautiful, peaceful facility with a Modern design and awesome services! I loved the atmosphere!

resp.text: Thank you beautiful! We appreciate your patronage and your lovely review!

name: Annette Joplin
text: I got the gold special facial, Tiana was awesome. She has a great touch, along with being very skilled in her craft, she can explain your procedure and make recommendations for a skin regimen for you to follow. This place is gorgeous and just makes you feel relaxed from the moment you are greeted.  Loved my experience and will be back. Thanks Jessica for making the referral. Clair, you have an amazing place! Great job!  As for the one star review: Are you sure you went HERE??? Because they are so accommodating, I can not believe that statement.

resp.text: Thank you Annette! You are an absolute joy!

name: Jessica J
text: I completely disagree with the 1 star rating comments. SkinRx staff is very accommodating and very attentive. I’ve had several treatments and have been happy with all of them. Highly recommend!

name: Diane Smith
text: I had RF Contouring on my neck and am so glad I did.  The neck is a definite age definer. The fat and wrinkles ... visibly reduced.  I believe my neck has shrunk a full inch.  I am so happy with my neck now.  And the staff at SkinRx ... extremely helpful and professional.  Thank you SkinRx!

name: jennifer helfert

name: Jan Grissom
text: NO PAIN . Laser treatment on my face. Friendly, knowledgeable, fast service. Highly recommend.

text: don't even deserve one star if you ask that you are not satisfied they don't want to take care of it.
