name: Carla R
text: I had 3 skin things removed with a laser. The technique didn't hurt on my face or side, but it did on the side of my knee. The technician who did the procedure was very professional, she explained everything she was going to do before she did it. I was very impressed with Growing Younger and the whole experience. I would definitely go back!

name: Alexis Blackburn
text: Growing younger is such a great medi spa! The atmosphere when I walk in is great and the staff is so nice and helpful. They have the best prices around and offer a wide variety of services. Definitely recommend!

name: Rachel Abernathy
text:
This place is amazing. Always clean and smells good. Staff is extra sweet, usually do not have to wait long, they have free coffee and water. Very nicely decorated. My sister and I travel together over two hours to go there. They always remember our names no matter how long it’s been since we have been there. The doctor is very nice and professional. My sister has had fillers and she looks 10 years younger. I have had laser treatment on my inner thighs and love handles and it really made a difference. We both get weight loss medication, adipex. It WORKS!! I can’t say enough good things about them.
You should come try them yourself!! :):):)

name: brian witty
text: Great Doctor and Staff.  They listen to your needs and help you find the right program for you.  They are also very reasonable on their prices.

name: Pankaj Patel
text: This place is the worst I had my laser treatment and did not get a result the also burnt my hand and the satisfaction for me was horrible if there were neagitive star I would give many negative stars never go to this place you will not be satisfied and when I went to get my money back the reaseptionist guy was very rude D NOT GO TO THIS PlACE ever!!!!!!!!!!

name: Amanda Valdez
text:
Amazing group of professionals! They are up to date on the latest beauty trends while also taking the time to continue to educate themselves on the ever changing technology and skin care. Not only can you schedule a visit for cosmetic enhancements and maintenance to LOOK younger, their massage therapists and esthetician can pamper you and make you FEEL younger. Do you hate shaving? If you’re up for the challenge, go see Lydia for Laser hair removal! It’s worth every penny!

They offer great monthly deals to make sure everyone has an opportunity to look and feel their best!

The staff, environment, and affordability easily makes this the best Medical Spa in Madison/Huntsville!

name: Jesse Lyons Live
text: I could not have had a better experience at Growing Younger Clinic! I was treated like royalty from the moment I walked in the door. The facility is laid out well, the decor is tasteful and warm, and most importantly the place is very clean. I knew I was in good hands from the moment I walked up to the front desk. Their prices on procedures are incredible comparatively to other med spas. I had Miradry performed, and paid literally half of what all the spas and doctors offices in my area charge. Dr. Jamey performed my anesthesia and made sure I was comfortable and well numbed. Lydia was the technician who performed the procedure and she was thorough at explaining and was very warm and friendly. I also had cool sculpting done, and Emory checked on me multiple times throughout the procedure to make sure I was doing fine. World class staff!! I was blown away. I'll be back to get more work done. It's worth the 7.5 hour drive!

name: C
text:
I scheduled an appointment for a facial, a month ago. Called the day before about the possibility of canceling.  She told me if I canceled then there is a 25.00 fee. I decided that I will take off work and go. I get there at 9:45  was told they couldn't  find my name and it was canceled anyway. Front desk staff on the phone and in office was rude and knew nothing about the lady working the afternoon before.  Had to reschedule and the next appointment is a month away. Might just have to pass and go somewhere else.
Edit to add that Tonya called me immediately to squeeze me in the next day. I couldn't get out of work again soo .

name: Jose Maldonado
text: Great service

name: Shei Darksbane
text: We love Growing Younger! So friendly and punctual and skillful! We get the best care at a fantastic price. Thank you for all your help with our beauty needs!

name: Brittany Dale
text: I have been going here for for laser hair removal and the results are great. The hair grows back much thinner and at a much slower rate. Even when the hair is somewhat visible, you can't feel it. It feels bare like baby skin. The staff are nice and I really like the woman that does my treatments.

name: Jonas B.
text: Kiss them wrinkles goodbye.  At a good price.

name: Nat G
text: I got 6 laser treatments in my bikini area and within 3 months my hair is back. It did NOTHING. I also got coolslimming and they said it takes 4 months to see results and it didn’t work AT ALL. I will not spend a dime there ever again.

name: Chris Hunsberger
text: Have been here for a massage twice now and they have both been great.

name: Carmen Williamson
text: I initially went there for 8 i-lipo treatments manly for skin tightened in my abdomen area; and the young lady encourage me to get CoolSculpting done instead very polite staff great atmosphere the only thing that I didn't care for is after the CoolSculpting procedure she did not massage the area where the CoolSculpting was

name: Aimee Mcdermott
text: I went to get a microdermabrasion treatment there last week, mind you I have had several before but just moved to Huntsville and was hoping to find a place I could go and have one every few months... the woman who did mine was beyond RUDE ! She spoke maybe 5 words to me and I’ve never had such a harsh treatment the towels they use are not soft and she rubs your face like she’s scrubbing clothes! I will never return to this spa if you can call it that .. don’t expect anything nice if you go!! If I could rat them a 0 I would... AWFUL experience ! Go anywhere else but here!!!!!

name: Laura Gummel
text: Upscale facility, friendly staff and highly recommend. Will return for another massage.

name: MyLifeAsMycah
text: I've been going to Growing Younger for the last 7 months. I stumbled upon them on Groupon and took up an offer for laser hair removal. As an AA woman, I can attest that this place provides wonderful results. Amanda is my laser specialist and she is amazing. Definitely give them a try!

name: Christy Tallant
text: I absolutely love the services that I have received at Growing Younger. I am going on my second week of services with them. Since I have been going I have seen a dramatic change in my appearance. Their staff is well trained and is willing to answer any questions you have. I love the fact that when you walk into the building they welcome you with a smile and a hello. Darlicia always has a smile on her face. She is very knowledgeable and helpful during my procedures. I would recommend Growing Younger to all my friends.

name: Angela Drensek
text: I have been going to Growing Younger for just over a year now.  I have had Microderm Abrasions, Facials, skin tag removal, and laser hair removal.  My face texture is completely different than it was a year ago.  Their trained staff teaches you how to take care of your skin offering advice and wonderful products.  My makeup goes on better, and sometimes I don't even wear any makeup - the change has been that dramatic.  I have micros and facials once a month and have been doing so for the past year.  I have also undergone laser hair removal and after 6 appointments I have great results.  Being dark headed this is a life changing improvement.  I had my legs and underarms done - it is great not to have to shave.  I highly recommend Growing Younger.

name: Nilda Rivera
text: The staff  needs to ask more info on the phone prior to your appointment.  When you get there they tell you the doctors only there Thursday .

name: Kristin Barnett
text: I had a microdermabrasion facial. It was awesome. They had me in right on time and the girl was very nice and professional. My skin felt wonderful!!! I also had the B12 shots and was able to walk in and out with virtually no wait time.

name: Terri Thompson
text: Was badly burned by esthetician and received permanent damage during laser hair removal in 2015. No remedial action was taken on the clinic's part so I had to file complaints with BBB, Alabama Board of Cosmetology and because the owner is a chiropractor, had to file a complaint with the Alabama Board of Chiropractic Examiners. He was put on 5 years probation and fined several thousand dollars for unprofessional conduct and for performing services outside the scope of a chiropractic license--if the fine isn't paid by the deadline, his license will be suspended for that period of time. Do not recommend this clinic for laser services. None of my expenses (doctor, cosmetics, or even the botched laser service) were reimbursed by the clinic.

name: Ciearra Jackson
text: Enjoyed the staff and the service! Everyone was so friendly and efficient. The environment is so inviting. I didn't have just tremendous results with iLipo, but then again I did not increase my physical activity. However, the staff was great during the process, and I felt very informed about the procedure. I have a message waiting, and I can't wait to have some time away from work to use it. I definitely recommend Growing Younger to anyone in the Huntsville area.

name: Nyla Blakley
text:
Staff so friendly and reassuring. Everyone is so professional and I highly recommend.
Anything from weight loss, facial, massage, chiropractic and great advice on health products.

name: Malinda Powers
text: Hot flashes and night sweats are gone!  Easy treatment.  I can't believe that I struggled with them for 3 years when this was so easy.

name: Kanetha Jackson
text: Always have amazing results after Botox treatments!

name: Sandra Wilson
text:
Had a special running.
I had originally wanted an anti aging facial.
Tech talked me out of it, because of my skin condition. Opted for microdermabrasion.
She paid more attention to my forehead..didnt go near my folds around my nose.
Be prepared to fill out your medical life on paper, and then have them not look at it.
We did not do a full hour, which was the time that was suppose to be allotted.
As soon as the tech was tipped, she be lined to the employees office.
Certainly didnt feel very welcome or appreciated for my patronage.

name: Olivia Colvin
text:
I love this place! Think I stumbled upon this gem from Groupon originally. The staff is friendly, the place is impeccably clean every visit (I’ve been here about 6-7 times now.) Thus far I have only used their b-12 shots spartically for managing my anemia, but I love that I can get in and out every time, no appointment and longest I’ve ever waited was maaaybe five minutes! They offer unique monthly specials for a wide variety of services (massages, shots, facial treatments, non invasive body contouring) and never ever try to upsell me anything. I wish they offered more vitamin injection options, but that’s just me.

For the record, I am pretty sure that I have brought anywhere from one to three children with me at any given time and never once has the staff been rude or unwelcoming in the least (or maybe I just have that “Don’t even think about it” look down better than I thought!) I appreciate that as a mother I don’t get annoyed looks from the staff just for walking in the door.

Definitely looking forward to continuing my visits here for b12 and thinking about trying other treatments/services with this place in the future!

name: Amber Litteken
text: Everyone is very professional. Lazer hair removal is 100% worth it.

name: A. Zachery
text: I called to see if I could reschedule my appointment because I didn't want to be late, but I couldn't. The Groupon had already been redeemed by the business and there was a 24 hour cancellation policy. I understand the policy but why was my Groupon redeemed before services were rendered. When I finally got there through traffic, they said that I would only have 20 minutes for a massage.  I politely said ,"Thats okay, it's been a long week and my birthday is tomorrow. Dont worry about it."  So I left and I was a little hurt by the customer service I had received at this point and I went back in to ask if they were apart of the BBB, because at this point I saw where this was going.  The young lady at the front was really rude toward me and so was the man who is a massage therapists. I have scoliosis and I was looking for some relief for my birthday. I'm African American and I am just wondering if I wasn't, if it would've made a difference at all. I called to ask about the policy because I want to be treated fairly. The phone disconnected while I was asking and when I called back it went to voicemail. I called back from a different number and the phone was answered then it was passed to a man works there and he was even more rude than the young lady working at the front. I was in shock how fast he got annoyed with me and I wasn't being disrespectful at all. He then said that if I called back he would file harassment charges against me, then hung up me in my face. As a first time customer, I felt like I was treated really badly. I will not be going back to this business EVER AGAIN and I pray that justice is served for how I was treated.

name: Cassandra Henry
text: I have truly enjoyed Growing Younger for several services. I recommend Growing Younger to ALL my colleagues and friends.  Darlicia and Trista and just simply amazing. They made me feel so comfortable.  My husband comments every day that he notices the results of the ilipo ultra!!  I cannot express enough how much I value the experience I've had at Growing Younger.

name: Daphne Tabis
text: I visited Growing Younger a few times for i-Lipo treatments. I was very impressed by the friendly staff; they were professional, knowledgeable, and willing to answer all of my questions. I appreciated the appearance/ decor and cleanliness of the facilities. I look forward to future visits.

name: cecilia uselton
text: Trista is AWESOME!  I've had facial treatments at Growing Younger and it is a GREAT place to go.  Staff is nice and helpful.

name: Kaitlyn Gregg
text: I got the microdermabrasion. I found a Groupon and it was only $26 so I decided to give it a try. Overall, as this being my first facial I was not impressed and probably won't be back. A lady named Tonia did my facial. She wasn't knowledgeable about the products she was using. When I asked her questions, I got very blunt answers. After she cleansed my face, she dried it with what felt like a paper towel, and I don't know about y'all but a paper towel being scraped across your face after you just had a "vacuum" scrape it, is not comfortable. The microdermabrasion part itself was fine. But the before and after how she cleansed and dried my face was not ideal. I feel like they used very low quality moisturizers and lotions. I was surprised they didn't use any serums.

name: Jennifer Chesser
text: I have recieved B12 shots at Growing Younger and I couldn't be happier.  I have noticed I have been more energized.  The staff is wonderful and friendly.  I definitely recommend Growing Younger.

name: Pamela Hideko
text: Ashley is awesome. She microbladed my brows today & they look amazing!!

name: Sylvia Ortega
text: I had some I lipo treatments done there and every time I went the staff was friendly and beyond helpful! Growing younger is always up to date with the lastest treatments, etc and the facilities are always well maintained! I know they always have amazing promotions going on and I definitely will be back to try some of their other services!

name: Alicia Chambers
text: Growing younger has become my favorite place to visit. I've received peels, microdermabrasion, and B12 shots. The staff is so friendly, they make you feel so welcome. Trista is my favorite! I would highly recommend their services. They've also worked me in the on the day I called for a treatment. I return as often as I can. Great monthly specials and groupons as well.

name: Pamela Beckwith
text: Very pleased with service and the professionalism and kindness the staff offers.

name: Amber Harwell
text: I have received Botox plenty of times. My first experience with Growing Younger was a month ago and I received what they recommended I needed which was twice as much as I normally got at my other doctor. After a month I noticed that it was already wearing off. So I go back in and Dr. Wagner seemed very frustrated and stormed off and came back with Botox to fix the problem. I have never felt such pain while receiving Botox and hours later I still have a terrible headache. I’m pretty sure he took his frustration out on my forehead! Not only did I think their Botox was deluted but they also overcharged me $111.00. They charged me for 10 extra units that I never recieved. When I mentioned my refund they wanted to do a “store credit”. After refusing the store credit Dr. Wagner said “Well what do you want??” I replied my money back on my card! He refunded my money and I nicely said thank you. He replied yep and I walked out. Such a rude and awkward visit! I can’t believe he actually thought I would want to return back to use my $111 of store credit after he acted the way he did.

name: Tim Jordan
text:
Unprofessional treatment, they are nice till they get your money then treat unprofessional.
personal experience without going into much detail, but i would not recommend them to anyone

name: GiGi
text: Really friendly staff & their Groupons make it affordable for me!

name: Jennifer McCoy
text: The staff at the Growing Younger office was great. The specials that are offered are great!

name: Debra Mears
text: Went in because I noticed the Botox walk in Thursday flags and was about to leave in a couple weeks for my 60th Birthday trip. I got Botox and Juvederm done on my face. I would NEVER go back there or recommend them for either treatment. I had to go back a week later because the side of my mouth was caving in and they added more Juvederm. They said they had used a full syringe on me which I don't believe because the last place I had it done only used a half with better results! The BIG problem is  they said they used 40 units of Botox which last time I only got 20, they did not ask how many units I wanted! My eyes are practically closed and I can't open them. You can't see my eyelids at all and I can't raise my eyes up. Instead of looking better for my trip I looked awful with my nearly closed eyes. Everyone that knows me asked what did you do to your eyes??? Thank GOD Botox does not last to long and I'm praying this is a temporary result that will go back to normal. I thought they would be cheaper but they were the same price as my plastic surgeon only faster to walk in. I will wait to get an appointment with a professional surgeon next time. Not worth messing with my vision!

name: Crissy Thompson
text: Horrible customer service and very unfriendly.. I would give them a 0 if I could...

name: Christal Howard
text:
Had three microdermabrasion facials and they were absolutley wonderful,  My felt face soft and refreshed,  Staff members are very professional,
definatley will be back,

name: Cindy Mack
text: I started with having iLipo. I had fantastic results. Lost inches. Then went on to iLipo Ultra, even better results. Then I started the iLipo B12 injections, they gave me great energy, been doing them for about a year. Also about a year ago I started female hormone replacement pellets. I just had my 4th procedure and I feel fantastic. I have recommended Growing Younger and the hormone replacement to many of my friends.

name: Melissa Escamilla
text: B12! Fast, convenient, & happy to help!

name: Gmoney Christy's Emoney playlist
text: They are nice

name: Nina Rich
text: Love it

name: Taylor Queensbury
text: Man came in and shook my sister’s hand and didn’t acknowledge me. I must not be here. 😕

name: Paula Lindon
text: Nice facial

name: Arlene Brown
text: Interesting

name: Lynette Jarvis
text: Enjoyed the massage

name: Tammara Buckey
text: Tonia is awesome!

name: Faithful Kimberly Parker
text: My favorite place!!

name: Hannah Padilla
text: Horrible service! Worst experience EVER!!

name: Arlene Brown
text: Interesting

name: Jan Tubbs
text: I had cool sculpting done at this facility.  No change appeared and I was told at other places that I was overcharged for the cool sculpting. I will not return to this facility.  The staff was ok but not real friendly.

resp.text:
It is exceedingly rare to see no result.
I will review your pictures and contact you tomorrow.

name: Debbie Crabb
text: I have not been in the office because they will not respond to me email.

resp.text:
We try to answer all emails- I certainly apologize if we haven’t answered you.
This is a difficult time and everyone is doing the very best they can.  I am sure you will find an office that can meet your needs.

name: Anya Nicholson
text: Dr Petro’s office is professional and clean. Would recommend despite bedside manor which needs improvement. Came in as a new patient for two separate appointments, both in which she made inappropriate off-topic comments about my appearance. With how clean and professional her office is, I would expect higher quality treatment to patients, especially those that are new. Will not be returning due to this experience on separate occasions.

resp.text: You should certainly find a physician whose bedside manner resonates with you.  Being comfortable is essential to getting the results you deserve.

name: Stacy Giovinco
text: Wonderful! Beautiful atmosphere that is calming yet professional atmosphere partnered with Cutting edge technology and a wide variety of medical and esthetic opportunities to improve health, well-being and personal confidence are displayed and explained . I am excited to become part of the Petro 'family'.

resp.text: We are very happy to have you!

name: Lisa Newton
text: I would not recommend this place for the use of Restylane for eye bags!  I had this procedure a few years back and to this day continue to have issues with it!  It looks horrible!!  The staff were friendly and professional though!

resp.text: I would be happy to see you.  Restylane typically lasts 6-8 months so if there are issues persisting for years it should be evaluated.

name: Anne Ryan Cavin
text: Thank you Dr. Petro! The new office is so much better.. great move!

name: J Sosnovik
text: Excited to begin my tattoo removal sessions with Tisha at Petro Cosmetic. So far I was very pleased with the costumer service and facility. I would recommend any family or friends to go in and visit Petro Cometic before committing to anyone else.

name: Grant Greenlee
text: Best ever!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank YOU!

name: Krista Kiser
text: I'm very happy with the service I received at Premiere Dental Spa. Dr. Teneshia was very informative and professional. I will be returning.

name: Rosemary Davidson
text:
Relaxing environment for a massage. Paul is my favorite massage therapist. Relaxing music, soft lighting, heated table. I return each month (or more). First, Paul does an assessment, observing the way I'm standing, or favoring one sore knee or hip before he begins. And he asks how I'm doing so he can specialize the massage.

Some times he uses hot stones, other times cold therapy, to encourage the tight muscles to relax. His deep tissue massage has increased my flexibility and released trigger points. He educates as he relieves aches and pains, so I can continue the good stretches and healing at home.
The spa offers wonderful services and reasonable prices. There are even packages available with monthly massages, treatments and facials.

name: Valerie Murphy
text:
I called the spa a few times for information and appointment. The young woman answering the phone seemed bothered by my call and quick to end the call. She hung up before completing her sentence.
We are new to Huntsville and the Tennessee Valley. We transferred from Florida to Restone Arsenal. I was expecting some southern hospitality BUT felt quit the opposite. I spend thousands on looking my best. I will NOT hand over my money to rude unappreciated businesses.

I strongly suggest Blue train their employees on PROPER phone etiquette.

name: Kristie Williams
text:
I'm not sure where to start, so I'll start with the positive. The facial was phenomenal. That's the end of the good. The Massage was TERRIBLE and I mean TERRIBLE! WORST I'VE EVER EVER EVER HAD! I teach massage therapy and I'm telling you, this guy would NOT pass my class. Worst experience ever. My best friends little boy can massage better and he's 4!!! Pitiful!
The robes had holes in them, the staff was very loud and didn't seem to care that we were paying a TON of money to be in sessions. People walking up and down the hall clunking LOUD shoes and basically yelling. AWFUL! This was my 1st time to a spa setting because I teach chronic pain therapy. If this is what it's like, I won't go back to another spa. The ONLY reason I gave a 2 was because the facial was very good.
Awful waste of money for everything else

name: VIELKA
text:
Hi I'm Vielka License Massage Therapist  since 2012 and I start working at Blue Med Spa this week 06/16/2017.  and I will like to build clientele there.
I will like to invite you all to give me one try as massage therapist there. and any positive or negative review about my massage are more then welcome, that is what make things better. and about the noise, I will mention this to the new manager. thank you! and hope to see some  you soon on my table.  :)

name: Sonya Bean
text: I had a horrible experience at this spa. I called in advance to get the balance on my gift card and was told it was $70 so I made a massage appointment. When I went to check out the very rude receptionist told me the card was not valid for a massage treatment. I used the same card in the past for a massage for me and my husband. I don’t know why today was any different . I offered to pay the $55 that I owed minus the gift card amount and she wouldn’t take my payment. She would not let me speak to the general manager and told me to call him or her Monday so I left and she stole $70 from my credit card. I will not be back to this spa and will pursue getting my money back. I did not authorize a charge to my credit card. I offered payment of the remaining balance after the gift card and she refused it. Thisp incident was ridiculous and very unprofessional  for such a supposedly high end establishment.

name: Mike Leotta
text: We came here four years ago and it was nice, they had a spa area downstairs with a locker room, sauna, jet tub, showers, and refreshments. My wife and I decided to come here again for a couples massage, like we had the first time and they had moved upstairs. So no more sauna area or any of that. Also, we wanted couples massages but were put in separate rooms, which isn't a big deal really but don't sell them as couples massages on your website and then your guests get a surprise when they're already there saying that oh no we moved upstairs sorry. I could hear someone running the sink in the next room when I was getting a massage. Four years ago it was great. Today, not so much. Their prices are the same and it isn't the spa experience we wanted. It feels like they cheaped out. I'd look elsewhere.

name: Wayne Martin
text: The last two times that I have gone for massages, the masseuse (different each time) talked to me. I left knowing too much personal information about them and their problems. It was very unprofessional. Also, the last massage was 90 minutes. I described tension in my neck as the main reason for being there. I was surprised when the 90 minutes came to an end and my neck had not even been touched. I will be finding an alternative spa in Huntsville.

name: Brittany Dale
text:
My experience at this spa was less than satisfactory. I figured since it was a more upscale spa that I would only have positive things to say, but I was very wrong. I went to get one syringe of Restylane. The doctor examined the structure of my face then proceeded to prepare injecting. First, he did not clean off the area he was injecting. Second, he did not wash his hands or put gloves on before touching all over my face or doing the injection. To no surprise because I have sensitive skin, the very next day I broke out in the same exact spot he touched. While injecting, he was sitting on a stool while I was propped up in the patient’s chair. I’m no doctor but I’m pretty certain that as the injector, he should’ve been standing to get a clear view of exactly where and how much product he was injecting. Lastly, he did not massage or smooth out the product during or immediately after injecting!! Which resulted in a lump. It wasn’t very noticeable from just looking at me from the front. However, I could definitely feel it and from the side view of my face you could tell something wasn’t quite right.

I gave it a couple of days for the slight swelling I had to go down and to give time for the Restylane to settle in. Also, he put more than half the syringe on one side of my face and what felt like air in the other side because there was no difference at all.  ALSO, the lump I felt was more so in the lowest portion of my check rather than the actual smile line where it should’ve been. I’m assuming this was due to him sitting during the injection and not having a clear view of what he was doing. 10 days later, lump is still there. I went back to the office and all he could do was offer to inject another syringe for $100 off. I declined the offer because I refused to spend any more money at that spa. Do not go here to get fillers.

Dr. Marlow at Infinty Med-i-Spa fixed all the issues I had.

name: Jonathan pike
text: I had some laser hair removal done at blue med spa, and  i had a great experience and well trained and pleasant staff that made my time there great. The Massage i had there was awesome to,  Thanks Great Job!

name: Joshua Walters
text: I was initially nervous about surgery, but Dr. Bundrick put me at ease!!  Thanks Doc!  Great staff.  Great all around.

name: Tracy Williams
text: Dr. Bundrick is wonderful!!! He was so patient and answered all of my questions very professionally. GREAT experience!!!

name: Addy Noms
text:
This used to be one of the most well appointed spas in Huntsville.  The female lounge had a hot tub, wet sauna and dry sauna as well as showers.

For the past several months, the hot tub has been broken.  The wet sauna is neglected, dingy and smells like mold when you walk in.  The dry sauna is working correctly.

There's a general aura of neglect that makes the expensive price tag undefendable.  I still have pretty good massages here but I get the sense the place isn't as profitable as it needs to be and maintenance and upkeep is suffering.

For a $100 massage and automatic 18% gratuity, I expect the facilities to be in working and clean order.  For now, I'm going to Terrame where the massages are less expensive and the environment is the same - they have a dry sauna too.

name: John Zuber
text: So So,  The facility really needs cleaning and new robes and sandals.  The personel were fine and did thier jobs, but management is just not keeping the facility up.  While waiting in the waiting room I noticed the heating / cooling vents were extremely dirty to the point of almost stuff hanging down from them.  The robes were dingy and sort of smelly not s nice smell at all.  It convinced me not to get another massage or pedicure at this place again.  Not sure what the health rating was ?  Never saw the inspection/rating sheet.

name: melanie aldridge
text: Disappointed in the filler results.  A follow up left it even worse.  All that money spent, and the trust placed in the doctor.  All of it wasted as I am going to another doctor to rectify the unfortunate results.

name: Jade Carter
text: Terrible!!!!

name: Ashley Waters
text: Was so excited that they use CND shellac, only to find that they only have a few colors. When I picked my color, I also picked a matching for my toes. Pedicure was fine, but once the shellac went on for the manicure, it was obvious it was old, picked another color that was close, also old. So two hours later, I left with only a pedicure. The nail tech was  apologetic, but didn’t offer anything to make it better. When I was checking out, I wasn’t asked how everything was or anything. I’m only posting so that they can fix the expired nail product issue. Very disappointed, as I expect more from such a nice spa/salon.

name: Carol Burt
text: Wesley will be having a repeat customer amazing

name: Amy Ryan
text: I have been going to Morgan for a few years now and started with the basics and products and gradually started getting more aggressive procedures done. She is the best and I’ve been many places. She is educated and truly concerned about the health of your skin and making you feel and look beautiful! Everything she has suggested has been amazing and worth every penny. I will never take my skin anywhere else and I look forward to just looking younger with each procedure! You will not be sorry trying her services BUT be prepared you will be addicted after the first appointment! 💜

name: Destiny Robertson
text: So I had a facial done by Morgan and the facial itself was great. The only complaint I have is that I paid for an hour facial.  I arrived early in case I needed to fill out paperwork. My appointment time was 10:00 AM. I sat in their waiting area for 30 minutes before she called me back. At this point is was after 10:10, she took me to my room then left while I got undressed. I laid there for what felt like forever before she came back in. So she didn’t begin my facial till at least 10:20. When she was done I was getting dressed and looked at my phone for the time and realized it was only 10:48......  I won’t be going back. I paid $95 for an hour facial and only got about 30 ish minutes. Not happy about that. :(

name: Summerann Miller
text: Petra is absolutely the BEST!  I have never had "good" skin, but after pregnancy I was especially self conscious about it.  I didn't go anywhere without full coverage liquid foundation with full coverage powder foundation on top.  After a year and a half working with Petra, I now have "good skin".  I only wear foundation if I want to!

name: Margarete Block
text: My visit at Spa Bella Vie was fantastic! Petra was experienced and very knowledgeable regarding the Plasma Pen procedure. Throughout the treatment she was very, very  kind and kept me informed regarding the progress. I can highly recommend the spa and Petra!!

name: Karen Bee
text: Petra was my esthetician and she is amazing! I come from Maryland to spend time with my daughter and always come and see her. She is the best! I wish I could duplicate her and take her back to Maryland with me!

name: Alex Goins
text: Morgan is the absolute BEST! She is always so caring and passionate about her job and makes me feel my best! Will be staying with her forever!

name: General Rage
text: I went for a haircut at Tera Lane and Katie was amazing! You have got to call and schedule an appointment with her

name: CADE W
text: I had a facial in October , in which I was able to take home the product that was used on my face . When i got home and was excited to check out the product that was used on me during the facial, only to see that every product used on my face and given to me was expired in 2018 ..I called to speak with them about this 3 times only to hear every time that the new product hasn’t gotten there and they will give me 15% off next time. So i guess they are still doing facials with expired products, very disappointed in this experience because before this I loved getting my facials here

name: Dawn Zink
text: I received a massage and facial a couple Saturday’s ago - masseuse was fabulous and worked through an injury I had.  The esthetician- Morgan - was so unprofessional and the worse I’ve ever experienced. Made a snide comment about me being late - when her schedule was wrong and I corrected her that the front desk called and changed my appt. However, after confronting her snide comment - she argued for a few seconds with me.  Then after my facial I realized she never did the dermaplane portion - when I asked she immediately was defensive and argued she did it. However I have had one and I know she didn’t and all peach fuzz on my face was still present. I will never go back and it’s sad BC the masseuse was fabulous.  I just don’t appreciate such an unprofessional person.

name: Mark Dasian
text: Katie(katy) does a great job.. the staff are friendly and polite. There is definitely a positive energy here

name: Kelsie Verble
text: PLEASE DONT GET YOUR NAILS DONE HERE! I went here because they take Bama cash and I didn’t have money for nails. I got a fill for my acrylics with gel nail polish and they look absolutely warped. I’m literally embarrassed to go out in public and I don’t have the money to get them fixed. I was too nervous to tell them I hated it because the lady that did my nails was so nice. But this just isn’t it.

name: emi tyra
text: LOVE this place. Top-notch services, expertly skilled staff (special shout out to Morgan!), the personnel always accommodating and helpful. The site itself is gorgeous; the atmosphere, exquisite. Plus, Dr. Bunch is obviously just the best ever. Highly recommend!

name: Karli Guyther
text: I tried the ear candling and got a major ear infection. I also got a fungus from the nail salon twice. The pedicurist told me that it was "normal." The only good thing about this salon is the massage therapists.

name: Francisco godinez
text: Great place. Super nice people. Everything so clean.

name: Catie Cavell
text: Petra has changed my skin forever. Before I had major problems with cystic acne that even left me with open cuts on my face. Now I can go out in public with no makeup on and get compliments on how clear my skin looks.

name: josett Hinton
text: My boyfriend purchased me a gift card for Valentine's Day. I went, which was more than a small distance, to Spa Bella to find out they had lost the transaction. My boyfriend kept calling to try to resolve the matter. Everyone there we talk to said they couldn't find our name including the manager. So my boyfriend had to go to the bank for a bank statement to prove he had made the purchase. I receive a call saying someone had spelled the name wrong  and I can come back to use my certificate. At this time I'm frustrated. I requested a refund and was told I couldn't receive one when they made the mistake. Me and my boyfriend spent time and gas trying resolve the issue when I think they could have resolved it better and in a timely matter.

name: Kelley
text: They're very welcoming! I got a full hour Swedish massage. You fill out a form beforehand stating where you'd like them to focus on and where you don't want to be touched. The only negative part of my experience is that the three places I specifically wrote I didn't want to be touched, my massage therapist touched. I didn't exactly feel comfortable telling her during my massage cuz I wrote it down on the form which I had handed to her. It made parts of my massage tense for me.

name: Dana Standifer
text: Amazing place for facial, spa treatments, pedicures! The ambiance is warm and so soothing. Very kind and professional associates.

name: Emily Harrelson
text: I love this place! They have wonderful massage techs. Also they do men's waxing, which is hard to find in Tuscaloosa.

name: Laura Archibald
text: I got a massage as a surprise gift for my Birthday. My daughter is awesome. It was my first time at Bella, and I loved it. Nice atmosphere and staff. Just what I needed.

name: John Riddle
text:
Amazing experience.
Wonderful staff
Highly recommend
We went for a couples massage and every aspect from start to finish was above expectation

name: LaShandra Hatcher
text: Carlita did a great pedicure for me! I've always gotten great massages from here and I really enjoy the ambience and amenities while you wait.

name: Zoey Jones
text: Great spa. Dr. Bunch is the best

name: Kelley Mallone
text: Gorgeous place! Everything about this spa is beautiful and well thought out. The staff is so nice and the services are spectacular!!

name: Paige Hockman
text: Awesome experience! Beautiful spa, with lots of pampering. Prices are comparable to other spas in the area but you can usually find a great promotion on their Facebook page.

name: Colbi Crook
text: The best staff and the most beautiful spa in town!!

name: Andrea Shepard
text: I have gotten many deep tissue massages in my life and none of them even compare to kami's massages. I work a very hig paced stressful job which causes knots in my back and kami is the only person who has given me a massage and I walked out feeling like I had a brand new back. She is worth every penny and I won't be changing spas. All around amazing experience.

name: Gabrielle Van Hoet
text: The staff here is attentive & I always come out happy. Would recommend.

name: Tammy Robertson
text: Very relaxing and the staff are professional

name: Frances Jones
text: I went to Spa Belle La Vie with my sisters...we had a great time, it is so calming, peaceful & relaxing. We really njoyd this!

name: Taura
text: Very relaxing atmosphere.

name: AM Johnson
text: Can't wait to go back! Petra is awesome!

name: Lanora Bayer
text: Nice place.

name: Andrew A
text: Very relaxing! Worth the price!

name: Aalia Al-Barwani
text: So relaxing and everyone is so professional yet friendly

name: Larry Franks
text: Totally rejuvenating!!

name: Andrew Kuhl
text: Excellent staff

name: Sha Harris
text: Nice place with good service

name: Belinda Bernard
text: Excellent experience!!

name: Cheryl Suttles
text: Madison was absolutely fantastic and awesome.  She explained everything prior to my hydrafacial and explained every step throughout the process.

name: Stephanee Simmons
text: I wish I could have done this sooner! Dr. Rousso is an absolute artist and couldn’t be more happy with choosing him as my doctor! My results are natural, beautiful, & life changing! 10/10 Recommend!

name: lily slater
text: Dr. Rousso did my nose about 5 years ago. He absolutely changed my life. The only thing I saw in the mirror was my nose and I hated it. Now I love my nose, and my side profile. By far the best decision I ever made. Whenever I tell someone that I had a nose job they are always surprised because my nose looks so natural and perfect on my face. I had consults with two other doctors and both of them said that they would do it but they recommended Dr. Rousso because he specializes in faces and noses. They said he would do a much better job than they could have done. I 100% recommend going to Dr. Rousso for anything face related.. because why wouldn't you want someone who specializes in faces to do your face?

name: Patricia Clark
text: I had a face lift (temple cheek neck lift w/endoscopic forehead, upper & lower eyelids, SMAS lips, nasolabial & melolabial folds) 3 months ago with Dr. Daniel Rousso.  He came with very high recommendations from numerous people I know, both personally and in the healthcare field, which led to my decision to choose him to do my surgery.  The care and expertise I received from Dr. Rousso and his team was exceptional.  My results far exceeded all expectations I had prior to surgery, and I am so grateful I made the decision to choose Dr. Rousso.

name: Virginia Limbaugh
text: I had the best experience at Dr. Rousso’s office. The staff were so nice, helpful, and thorough with helping me with everything that I needed. Dr. Rousso is the best and I could not be happier with my results!

name: Randy W. Harris
text: Dr. Russo and his amazing team are absolutely the best in the business. From first consultation to my finished procedure, Dr. Russo and staff were the epitome of professionalism. Each person was kind, compassionate, and willing to make my experience as pleasant as possible. I cannot say enough food things about Russo Plastic Surgery. I will definitely return in the future. Thank you so much Dr. Russo and team!

name: Katy Santello
text: Had a wonderful experience at Dr. Rousso’s office with Dr. Adams. The staff were friendly and efficient and I felt very comfortable in the clean and welcoming environment. Highly recommend!

name: kathi ruffino
text:
When choosing a surgeon trust is vital.
Dr Rousso   is an impeccable Surgeon. I highly recommended Dr. Rousso,  he and his staff are extremely knowledgeable and make it   comfortable to  communicate  with .
Dr. Rousso spends time during  the consultation getting to know his patients , making certain their expectations are met .

name: Bobette Brizendine
text: Fabulous experience! Staff and Dr Rousso were extremely kind and supportive before and after procedure. Traveled from Atlanta for his expertise and it was worth it. Will never let anyone else touch my face.

name: Jonatha Temple
text: Dr. Rousso and his staff were the best! They treated me like a king! The whole staff was caring professional and kind! At one point they found a neck pillow for me so I could be more comfortable, that’s above and beyond. From beginning to end , this was a great experience! If you are looking for what they do at Dr. Rousso’s office , look no further! Your in the right place.

name: Scott Smith
text: Dr. Rousso is an excellent physician and plastic surgeon.  He does more than cosmetic work.  Don't let an ENT do surgery on your nose.  Go to Dr. Rousso for any kind of nose or face surgery.  Your insurance will pay Dr. Rousso for any kind of surgery that your ENT would do.

name: JAMES HIGGINBOTHAM
text: Dr. Rousso does a fabulous job with my Botox. He injects along my hairline to ensure that my brows don't drop. He is a true expert with faces, and I will only trust Dr. Rousso with my Botox and any other facial procedures.

name: Skylar R
text: THE STAFF WAS GREAT. THEY WERE ACCOMMODATING AND VERY UNDERSTANDING. THEY WERE SENSITIVE TO MY CONCERNS AND WERE VERY COMFORTING AND MADE ME FEEL SO AT EASE. I WAS WORKED IN AFTER A PROCEDURE WITH ANOTHER DOCTOR AND NO ONE EVER MADE ME FEEL THAT I WAS ANY TROUBLE. THEY MADE ME FEEL VERY VALUED AND SAFE.

name: Susan Holt
text: Dr Rousso and his staff were so incredibly friendly. My nose is perfect. Thank you, Dr Rousso!

name: Alexis H
text: Very friendly and informative. :) I was shown a photo of what my nose was to look like before surgery (photos were taken and photo editing software was used to predict its appearance) which made me feel much better about having the procedure done. Had a check up a week later and a month later and will have a few more in a couple of months to a year.

name: Mary Margaret Lodge
text: I am 6 months post procedure and I am loving my new face! As a 61 year old women, I looked at myself in the mirror and didn't recognize myself. I resorted to dimming the lights in the bathroom and only taking quick glances at my sagging face. Between the turkey neck and the bulldog jowls, I had to do something. I received many recomendations to see Dr. Rousso and I have NO regrets! Thank you, Dr. Rousso!

name: Vanessa Askren
text:
Love my results. Dr. Rousso and his staff are attentive and professional.
This is my second procedure with Dr. Rousso.The after care is exceptional and the sitters are very  competent at their job. I highly recommend Dr. Rousso .

name: Leslie Matheson
text: I have been extremely pleased with Dr. Rousso and entire staff! Wonderful experience!

name: Nikki Dobrzynski
text: Dr. Rousso, Nancy and Brandi were fantastic! I had fillers done, even though I am horrible with needles, Dr. Rousso made sure I was ok and took breaks when needed. My results are fabulous and I couldn’t be happier with the service and the results I have received from Dr. Rousso and his amazing staff! I would highly recommend Dr. Rousso for any service that you need.

name: Susan Mccann
text: My experience was very pleasing. The staff were very professional and courteous. The sitter, Sharon Burton was great. I would highly recommend you and your practice.

name: Peyton F
text: Fantastic !!! Wonderful staff . I always felt in good hands with all involved in my care. Dr. Rousso is very caring, gentle but most importantly he strives to be exact in his profession. He kept me informed on what to expect . He is an excellent !!!

name: Kim B
text: I have absolutely loved my experience with Dr. Rousso and his staff. They are incredible and are very willing to make you happy. I know I can rely on them anytime I need them. It has been 6 years since my operation and I am very pleased with my results. Great staff!

name: Ashley G
text: I had a great experience with all the doctors here. They were extremely nice and gave me great results. I could not be more pleased with my experience here.

name: Peyton L
text: Dr. Rousso is an outstanding doctor who listens to the needs and wants of his patients. You are made to feel so very special and my results were amazing. If i knew what i know now, would I have the cosmetic surgery again. In a heartbeat.

name: Devin Day
text: Dr. Rousso is an incredible doctor who is a gifted artist when it comes to Plastic Surgery. After a few short weeks, I looked like I did 15 years ago...Many who I have not seen for sometime, wanted to know what skincare line I am using, as my skin looks firm and youthful. I have no trace of having surgery. I cannot express how incredibly satisfied I am with my outcome and would highly recommend Dr. Rousso to anyone who is considering plastic surgery.

name: Harper Hale
text: I had a great experience with Dr. Rousso. The surgery process went very smoothly and I am very pleased with my end result. My results were better than I had imagined they ever could be. If I ever had questions, it was very easy to get in touch with someone from Rousso's office. A great experience.

name: Morgan R
text: Dr. Rousso and his staff are amazing. Everyone I encountered was professional, knowledgeable, friendly, and patient. My questions were always answered in a caring manner, and this environment made me feel like a name and not just a number. I have never been more pleased. I would highly recommend Dr. Rousso to any family member or friend.

name: Jillian Ryan
text: I had a rhinoplasty done a few years ago and for the first couple years it was good, now it is terrible and my face looks incredibly uneven. My nose looks terrible now. the long term of his rhinoplasty are not good quality.

name: Kim Watkins
text: I am extremely pleased with the results, and have been treated with the utmost courtesy and respect by all members of the staff. I definitely chose the best doctor! If I need any more work in the future, I will be back to Dr. Rousso .

name: Devin Bryant
text: Dr. Daniel Rousso is a great plastic surgeon! He gave me a refreshed appearance without changing me into someone unrecognizable. My friends comment that I look great and rested but I still look like myself, just better.

name: Alexis Middleton
text: Dr. Rousso and his staff were amazing. My results were exactly what we had discussed. I would highly recommend.

name: Peyton M
text: I have been very pleased. They recovery was just as described and I have more confidence in my appearance and that was my purpose.

name: Jamie C
text: DR. ROUSSO IS HIGHLY SKILLED. MY NOSE LOOKS S GOOD AS POSSIBLE! THE HUGE SCAR IS NOT VISIBLE TO MOST OTHER PEOPLE!

text: I love everything about this clinic. Dr. Rousso is very direct in what he tells you he can and can not do for you. The staff are courteous and beautiful. Its a feel good experience. I am 100 percent happy!...Rylee B.

name: James Mayfield
text: Outstanding experience and results were as expected. Very knowledgable and courteous staff. Excellent care and follow up.

name: Jamey G
text: Dr Rousso is the most amazing and personal physician I have ever visited. He is professional and his work is un-equal by any physician I have met. Words will not express my appreciation for his services.

name: Ashley Wolf
text: Dr Rousso was highly professional and made me feel comfortable. I was confident and assured that I would be pleased and I was. Very much so.

name: Lindsey G
text: Dr. Rousso is a perfectionist. Absolutely works to make you look your best in a very normal way. He is without a doubt the best and his staff - each and every one - is fantastic. And I adore the setter, Tony who takes excellent care of you in the hotel. --LJG

name: Kate Hale
text: Everyone in the office is super friendly. I always feel comfortable when I come in and I like that I never have to wait long at all. I would definitely recommend dr. Rousso to others!

name: Tara D
text: I was extremely pleased with every aspect of my procedure. The pre-op appointments, operation, post-op care, and of course the results were all well above my expectations. I recommend Dr. Rousso to anyone contemplating facial plastic surgery. -- Tara D.

name: Jessica C
text: Super. Hard to tell my age! Botox might be next to fill in a few 'laugh lines.' However, I love the results as they are. -- Jessica C.

name: Jackie Vaughan
text: Dr. Rousso and his staff have taken great care of me, and I am very pleased with the results of my surgery!

name: Shawn R
text: Overall, have had a great experience with the staff and Dr. Rousso. I felt well taken care of during my surgery as well as throughout my recovery.

name: Sidney A
text: Dr. Rousso and his staff reflect a standard of excellence in every area of patient care. As an existing patient, but first-time surgery patient, the care I received was of the highest level. I would not hesitate to return for additional surgery or refer friends to Dr. Rousso.

name: Jillian Sanderson
text: I was very satisfied with the treatment and care from the doctor and staff, as well as with my results after the lip advancement.

name: Schuyler L
text: I was with my daughter at a modeling event when I met a lady with her grand-daughter. I could not believe she was old enough to have a 'grand-daughter'' She said she had interviewed doctors from all over the mid-south and had found Dr. Rousso to be the best. I must say after having used him twice now that I WOULD NOT ALLOW ANY PLASTIC SURGEON BUT DR. ROUSSO TO TOUCH MY FACE. Not only is Dr. Rousso an excellent surgeon but he is in tune with working with the patient to achieve the desired result.

name: Candace Ho
text: My experience with Dr. Rousso and staff has been all positive. From the beginning they worked me in super quickly! I made an appointment, and was in for my surgery within two weeks. I urge patients not to be frustrated by wait times. There are days your visit will be very quick, an other times you will wait. The wait just means he is in a procedure (one can not always control surrgical length) or he is spending ample time with another patient. You will get the same courtesy. All staff members have been top notch in their skill and customer service. Dr Rousso made my nose look completely natural again after a previous surgeon did NOT. I highly recommend a surgeon such as Dr Rousso if you plan on a rhinoplasty. You want someone that does facial work and not body work. I also want to add that he recommends an overnight stay at a hotel so you can be checked by his protege in the evening. I was not happy about this at first, but I promise it is well worth it in the end. Im so glad I stayed and Dr Richards was able to check my progress. I also appreciated the help from the sitter. Dr Rousso and staff have a very together and smooth running operation with great results.

name: Gale H
text: Dr. Rousso has measured up to all of my expectations. I am very pleased with the outcome of both my rhinoplasty and my chin augmentation.

name: Hayden R
text: Dr Rousso makes you feel as if your family. He and his staff always take the time to make you feel as if you belong. I never feel as if I am being rushed through a system. Having had two previous procedures to repair a deviated septum. It wasn't until I meet Dr Rousso, that I was finally able to breath and had a straight nose to look at in the mirror! ~ HDR

name: Ron Foster
text: My wife and I both have used Dr. Rousso with excellent results. There is none better!

name: Morgan England
text: Amazing! Wouldn't go to anyone else for dermal fillers.

name: Rowan S
text: Dr. Rousso and his staff made me feel comfortable through every step of my mini-facelift, mid-facelift, and bleph. The results are fabulous with a younger looking 'me'...no stretched look.

name: Alice Smith
text: Dr. Rousso was conscientious, caring, and compassionate in his demeanor with his patient, a friend of mine, and in his sharing of information regarding her surgery.

name: cyndycantley
text: Love Dr Rousso and his staff!

name: Evelyn P
text: STEER CLEAR. Cost me $20,000 to fix what he did.

name: Jaylin M

name: Judy Hughes
text: Everything was great.

name: Kristin
text: Dr. Mcclain is a awesome dr. He will be the only one I go to if I ever want to have anything else done. His staff is great and love Casey. They checked on me after my surgery and sent me some beautiful flowers. Dr. Mclain is truly a awesome dr and glad I found him.

name: Meleah Davis
text: I had been putting off an implant on a front tooth for a long time. Finally couldn't wait any longer. Dr. McClain and his staff were calm and patient with me during this process. I had little to no bleeding or pain after the initial surgery and Dr. McClain called to check in on me that same day. My nurse, Casey, was incredible. Talk with me through my nerves and answered all my questions. I like them so much I am taking my teen for her wisdom teeth extractions later this summer.

name: Elysia Taylor
text: Dr. Landon McLain really takes his time to listen to what your goal is, he speaks to you very personally and he never makes you feel rushed or that you’re just a dollar amount in front of him. He is so incredibly kind as is his staff as well. He provided me his personal cell number after surgery and told me not to hesitate to call or text him for anything at anytime. He has routinely checked on me as well, I couldn’t imagine a better customer service. No matter what questions you may have they never make you feel like it was a silly question and are always very helpful. He works with you to help you achieve your goal based on your what your body can give you. I absolutely love him as a surgeon and have been recommending him to all my friends. He also does AMAZING lip fillers as well. I’ve had mine done by him the last two years and every time they honestly look better than the “wish” pictures I’ve shown him. If your thinking about it or on the fence, just trust him and his crew! They will take care of you. He even had the most beautiful Bouquet I’ve ever seen sent to my house after surgery and continuously makes sure my pain level is at a tolerable level. I’ll definitely continue going to him for all my cosmetic needs.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review, Elysia Taylor! Feel free to text this number any time and we'll respond ASAP.

name: Greta Jones
text: Very quick service. I came in as a new patient and was able to complete new patient paperwork online which made it super fast to get in and out. Staff is beyond friendly and welcoming!!! Dr McClain listens to the patient and doesn’t try to “push” anything extra on you and wonderful bedside manner! Definitely can’t wait to go back in!!! Thank you for making my first appointment awesome!!

They went beyond and answered all my questions too. Yes I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM.
