text: I had a tummy tuck now 2 weeks ago and I could not be more pleased! Dr McLain and staff are the best! Dr. McLain did an amazing job and will forever be the only doctor to do my Future procedures. I highly highly recommend him!!!

name: Angela Hardy
text: Everyone in this place were absolutely wonderful. From the young lady at the front desk and everyone in between. I had a tooth really hurting me over a week. Called around and no surgeons could work me in. I found this place online and sent a message over the weekend. They got me in first thing Monday afternoon for a consultation and surgery Tuesday morning. Dr. MClain was so nice and made me feel at ease even though I was in pain. He even called yesterday afternoon to check up on me. I will definitely recommend this place to anyone needing a tooth extraction.

name: Michael Harrington
text: Went great, was what I expected had no pain issues and very professional.

name: Lu Reed
text: Very sweet staff! Awesome Dr who explains and goes over treatment clearly! Clean inside the facility and time efficient!

name: jewlani Sharp
text: My husband had surgery earlier this week and it was super quick and easy. When he sobered up from anesthesia all he did was brag about how professional everyone was. We have been here twice now and we have always had a positive experience.

name: C Dills
text:
I was very impressed by the entire team at McLain Surgical Arts. Staff is super sweet and very helpful. Extremely impressed with Dr. McLain. I am very particular about the physicians I choose. Dr. McLain is a double  board-certified physician who is really nice and down-to-earth. I felt very comfortable discussing my dental issue with him.

No dental procedure is ever “fun“ - especially when a tooth must be extracted, but the procedure was done in a second it seemed. Of course, I asked to be sedated so I didn’t feel a thing! Everything went very well! The procedure took half an hour from start to finish and that includes checking in and out.

Once I arrived home, I had a few questions which they responded to on-the-spot. I’m currently in the process of  healing and waiting for the implant procedure. Everything’s gone exactly as planned and I’ve had zero issues.

I would absolutely recommend 100%. If you’re fearful in seeing an oral surgeon, don’t be. Don’t ignore the pain, McLain Surgical Arts will take great care of you! Waiting only makes matters worse. I needed this procedure done a few months ago but due to Covid I was afraid to see a doctor. The entire staff follow CDC Covid procedures. You have the option of waiting in your vehicle versus their waiting room, which I thought was great! Check out their website, and again don’t put it off because it’ll only get worse... 😕

name: Alexandra Hattaway
text: Dr. Mcclain and his staff are very professional and the office is extremely clean!

name: Tia Wheeler
text: Excellent care for oral surgery. Surgeon and staff were very concerned with my well being. Doctor called on a Saturday to check on me. Never had to wait more than a few minutes.

name: Paul Dixon
text: Warning they do not accept single patients must have family in area can not use uber or a payed driver.  also they will not work with you on scedual they say they are available but then are not . I highly recommend not using this doctor .

resp.text: We do require an escort to take sedated patients home and unfortunately ride services do not meet the requirements.  If you have procedures done without IV sedation or general anesthesia, an escort is not required.

name: Kristina Vincent
text: I can’t thank Dr. McLain enough for taking care of my son this morning. My son’s dentist contacted Dr. McLain about removing his wisdom teeth after he came home from college in horrible pain. Within an hour he worked him into his schedule. From checking-in to leaving his office (without the 4 painful wisdom teeth) was approximately one hour. The staff was so kind and professional, as well as super efficient. I’m a super grateful mom who highly recommends McLain Surgical Arts.

name: Andrea Smith
text: Had a great experience with him and his staff. My procedure was quick, recovery was easy with minimal pain and no scarring, and I'm happy with my results. I'm hoping to get another procedure soon! Highly recommend!

name: Vickie Shaw
text: For someone who doesn’t like to go to the dentist, much less have an extraction, Dr. McLain and his staff were fantastic. They totally put me at ease from the receptionist to the hygienist to Dr. McLain. I would highly recommend his office!!

name: Wendy Smithson
text: If I am going to be honest, the Holy Spirit lead us to this place.  When we began the journey to have surgery done on my son's ear, I searched from Huntsville to Birmingham to other states, but was lead back to McClain Surgical Arts each time.  I cannot begin to tell you how wonderful and professional Dr. McClain and his staff have been.  My son's surgery went extremely well and we are beyond pleased with the results.  The surgery was performed at Crestwood Medical Center, and again, we could not be more pleased with the service there also.  I highly recommend Dr. McClain and his staff without reservation.

name: Robert littleton
text: Always Very precessional and courteous.

name: stephanie merrell
text: From my initial consultation  to post-op appointment Dr. McLain and his staff treated me with respect, patience and extreme professionalism. My results were better than I could have imagined! I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Jeff Brownback
text: Very knowledgeable Dr. and a friendly staff.

name: Kristen Elmore
text: The staff here is AMAZING! Dr McLain answered all of my many questions, his bedside manners rock, and it’s so personable that he takes the time to call and check on his patients himself! I would 110% recommend this place!

name: Brea Cothren
text: Dr. McLain and his staff are AMAZING!!! They are professional and very welcoming.  I went to him for a mommy make over, and he delivered!! I had breast augmentation and a little liposuction done on my lower abdomen. I couldn’t be any happier with my results. Dr. McLain took time to personally give me a call after post op and even sent me a lovely bouquet of flowers. Casey made sure I was taking care of and that all my questions were answered. She was friendly and made me feel comfortable during the whole experience, as well as, Dr. McLain.  I will definitely go back if I ever decide to have anymore procedures done.

name: tiffany siverling
text: From my first visit to now my first follow up visit Dr.Mclain and his staff have extremly great, they have answered all of my questions from the silly ones to the serious ones. I would recommend and have already recommended them to everyone I know that is looking for plastic surgery! Casey, Becky and Dr.Mclain made me feel 100 % better and not nervous at all!

name: Lucretia Workman
text: Did a fabulous job with extracting a troublesome tooth that my son was in an enormous amount of pain because of the tooth. The procedure went very well. The staff is AWESOME SAUCE!!! 5 star customer service... I'll be returning to have work done on myself. My son said he'd love to return as a established patient of Dr. McLain....

name: Emry McKay
text: Dr. McClain and his staff were kind and helpful.  They addressed all my concerns about repairing a scar from an injury and made me feel comfortable.  Dr. McClain followed up on my progress which I really appreciated.  I would recommend this great team to any one!

name: Allison Thomas
text: I have always had the best experience here. Being in the medical field I appreciate an office that exceeds my expectations. The front office staff is so kind and accommodating! Melanie, Lynn and Taylor are so good at what they do and put me at ease every time.  I highly recommend Dr. McLain and his entire office!!

name: Makeup Fiend
text: Not happy at all. I had lip fillers in January and still have 2 lumps in my top lip. I’m now going elsewhere.

resp.text: Fortunately, all lip fillers used at McLain Surgical Arts are temporary and can also be easily dissolved if any asymmetry develops.  Occasionally, filler treatments will require adjustments.  We sincerely apologize that we didn't meet your expectations for the treatment you underwent.

name: Karlee Stenger
text: I recently had my wisdom teeth extracted at Dr.Mclain’s office. Dr. McLain and his sweet assistant finished the entire procedure quickly and explained all the post surgery instructions to my husband, along with giving us a detailed list of instructions. I get anxious in any doctors office, but the entire staff makes you feel completely at ease! If you are needing dental extractions, I highly recommend going to Dr. McLain!

name: Lacey Gilliam
text: I am so pleased with my visit. I scheduled a consultation but called today to see if I could come earlier. Sweeeeet Nicole placed me on a cancellation list and ended up getting me in. From the moment I walked through the door I knew I had chosen the right place for my first (and all, moving forward) lip fillers. Taylor took AMAZING care of me and was personable, friendly and made me feel at ease. Dr. McLain listed to me and did better than I even hoped for. I felt almost zero pain during the injection. I felt one tiny sting but it was mostly painless. I went straight back to work feeling great. Highly recommend!

name: ThatBMXlover
text: They took out all 4 of my wisdom teeth and I could not have had a better experience. Very professional care, and the surgery went very well with little healing complications. Dr. McLain was extremely professional, well versed, and answered any question I had

name: JACOB ROE
text: I went in just this morning for wisdom tooth removal. The staff was excellent in every way. I was in and out quickly and surprisingly I  am in no pain at all. From the time I arrived to the time I left my needs were met with extraordinary urgency and professionalism that would have exceeded even the highest expectations.  Thank you so much Dr. McLain and staff for your superior customer service and care.

name: Farrah H
text: I called to schedule my daughter’s wisdom teeth removal and asked if they could do removal and consult on the same day. The woman told me they could call and get X-ray and referral from her dentist and that wouldn’t be a problem. Fast forward to today, day of appointment, my daughter called to see if she could eat beforehand and was informed by Nicole they wouldn’t be doing the extractions today. She took off work and schedules have been made. That time and pay is lost along with when she has to take off again for actual surgery. People in that office need to communicate and figure out what is and isn’t possible. Nicole’s nonchalant attitude about my daughter’s lost pay, pain, and wrong communication on their part is completely unprofessional.

name: Angie Jaggers
text: I had THE BEST experience with this practice from the moment I walked in the door.  The entire staff is friendly and professional.  I am so pleased with my breast augmentation!! I am a runner, so it was important to me that I can continue my routine.   Dr. McLain and his entire staff listened to what I wanted, and they exceeded my expectations.  I HIGHLY recommend this office!  The process was easy and literally pain free from start to finish.  Do yourself a favor and consult this practice FIRST!!

name: Rachel Bradley
text: Wonderful office staff, kind and welcoming. Helped with all of my issues! Had my wisdom teeth pulled. Very quick and so far no issues. Would recommend!

name: Amanda Moore
text: Awesome experience!! Very thorough and attentitive, Casey was great with my son for his consultation and his surgery!!

name: William Andrews
text: A family member had a procedure done recently.  The process was smooth. Check-in was efficient and they were taken right to the back.  The procedure was done quickly and went very well.  Good follow instructions were provided and Dr. McClain even called us that evening to check-in to see how the recovery was coming along.  Overall, we were very satisfied with the care we received.

name: Lee, Laugh
text: The friendliest, most courteous, professional office imaginable. But what really matters are the results. I have seen Dr McLain for several procedures and the results have always exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend.

name: sheila Beam
text: I was pretty much sold on Dr. McLain when a friend recommended him to me.  Then I called to set up my consultation and that was all it took.  Finally got to meet Dr. McLain and his staff and WOW!!  Each and every person in that office is there to help you make the right decision and to make sure you are well taken care of.  They treated me like family.  We discussed a breast lift with augmentation.  We were going to do it in one surgery.  Upon further study, Dr. McLain decided to do it in two surgeries instead because he felt like I would get better results and the healing process would be much easier on me.  I am 2 weeks in to the first surgery and I look and feel amazing.  I have no reservations about the second surgery at all. Dr. McLain and the staff at McLain Surgical Arts are just the best.  Call them if you don't believe me.  If you get to talk to Becky or Melissa you will totally agree with me.

name: Mackenzie Moreno
text: AMAZING wisdom teeth experience! Was terrified and have constantly put if off for years, the doctor and staff took all my concerns and questions very seriously and worked hard to make sure I had the answers to every silly question I asked. Which made me as comfortable as possible. Me and my brother got it done the same morning and were in and out in no time. I had zero pain afterwards, so much that I didn't even require the medication. I highly suggest this doctor because the atmosphere and friendly staff put you at ease. This extraction experience was easier and more pain free then some of my cleanings! Thanks again, wish I had done it sooner.

name: Nicole Blas
text: I was supposed to have my wisdom teeth removed with a different dentist and unfortunately that appointment had to be cancelled at the last minute due to some unforeseen circumstances explain I had already taken the time off from to get it done and had been too wait over a month to get approval from job and they were  nice enough to get me in the same day I called and get me in for surgery the next day. They were so nice understanding and very professional. I will recommend them to anyone who ask me for an oral surgeon. Thank you so much for getting me in. I really do appreciate it.

name: Patrick Atkins
text: Fast and professional.

name: Sheila T.
text: They were not 100% truthful about what was going to happen during my TMJ procedure. Their "deep sedation" is a joke. I felt everything and cried throughout the entire procedure. They don't let you get fully awake either before shoving you in a wheelchair and expect you to leave. I expected much better from somone who came so highly recommended.

name: Stefanie Mcclure
text: I always feel so welcomed at Dr. Mclains office! Everyone there is so kind, knowledgeable, and sincere. I highly recommend them for whatever your need is !

name: Celisa Dooley
text: Dr. McLain is absolutely the BEST!! Patient care & satisfaction are definitely at the TOP of his priorities. He and his staff are AMAZING. They take time to answer all questions, and address all concerns. I am VERY pleased with my results!!! If you are considering any kind of cosmetic surgery, he is definitely the right choice!!!

name: Kiarra Lewis
text: I love Dr. McLain. He is by far the best surgeon ever. The office took very good care of me. I received phone calls and cards. I even received beautiful flowers the day after my procedure. I will recommend Dr. McLain to anyone who’s looking to upgrade their look. He made me so comfortable I felt like I knew him for years. He gave me exactly what I wanted.  Thanks Dr. McLain

name: SarahKP
text:
Dr. McLain and his staff are amazing!
I had been through the ringer searching for an oral surgeon, trying to find one that would actually treat me like a person rather than just another case, one that actually cared about helping me deal with the insurance company, as well as come up with proper treatment for my unique case. Dr. McLain was the 4th surgeon I had been to and initially I just went to him for a second opinion but after meeting him and his amazing staff I made the choice to switch surgeons and I'm so glad I did! I underwent corrective jaw surgery and I couldn't be happier with the results. Dr. McLain is very talented and has an eye for aesthetics. I highly recommend him no matter if you're looking for oral surgery or cosmetic surgery.

name: Bobby Gilbert
text: Don't normally give a perfect 5 of 5 score, but Dr. McLain was exceptional.  My daughter had 2 wisdom teeth removed which took less than 20 minutes.  At 7pm that night, Dr. McLain  called to check on her then gave us his cell phone number and told us to call if there were any problems.

name: Haley Jones
text: Dr. McLain and his staff are beyond WONDERFUL! Due to my wisdom teeth becoming very painful as well as a few other issues, I was able to get in and have them removed within a matter of two to three hours from first calling them. I had called several places who weren't going to be able to do same day surgery but they managed to get me in as fast as they could. They were all very friendly, very informative and very quick in dealing with my pain. I would recommend them to absolutely anyone who needed this type of surgery done, and more!

name: Aleisha Greenhaw
text: Dr. McLain & the Staff are Wonderful! Very professional, great work, and give a genuine feeling of being cared for as an individual. Highly Recommend! 👍🏼

name: suzystephens
text:
I just had implant surgery four days ago with Dr. McLain. Everyone was telling me it was a very unpleasant procedure, but they were wrong in this case!. The doctor made me wait an extra five minutes on the anesthesia to make doubly sure I was completely numb, which I appreciated. Basically, he didn't try to  rush this at my expense.  And, I felt zero pain, not even any discomfort at all!  Even my stitches (which will dissolve) haven't bothered me.
My husband drove me home, but I could have driven myself, since I didn't even have the expected bleeding.  The anesthesia just barely started wearing off after I'd already taken my first prescription for pain medication, and so I never suffered at all. When I woke up the next morning, I was prepared to take more pain medication, but I realized I didn't need it and never took any more. What a pleasant surprise.
Dr. McLain personally called me the same evening to find out if I was doing okay.
Also, the actual wound was closed up so neatly, you could barely even see it.  Maybe that's because the doctor is also a cosmetic surgeon.  After this experience, I would wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Mclain to anyone. Quick, and painless, and NO complications.

name: seth mazyck
text: Everyone was very kind to me.  The staff was very friendly, and the doctor was very punctual.

name: Cathy Eacret
text: I am going to Dr. Mclain after 2 different implants failed. I was extremely apprehensive about getting it done for the 3rd time but after talking with Dr. Mclain, I have became less fearful and my surgery is in about a month. I can’t believe I am saying this but I am less fearful than I have ever been knowing that I will be having surgery soon. Dr. Mclain is very compassionate and his entire staff is awesome. I have never experienced this kind and compassion and kindness ever before. I know my surgery is going to go well and I just wished Dr. Mclain and his entire staff knew how much that means to me after being physically abused by a dentist. I trust Dr. Mclain 100%, and I have never ever felt like this in my entire child and adult life. Thank you Dr. Mclain and staff!! You are the best!!!!!

name: Mark Quick
text: My wife had jaw surgery this morning. They took excellent care of her and were very informative on what was going on and what they was doing. They even came in early to get her in. She was referred to them from the emergency room that she was seen at last night .

name: Nicole Richard
text: Dr. McLain and his staff are patient with their patients!  They answered all my questions about my procedure, which was a tooth extraction.  I was very nervous because this was a permanent tooth.  Tooth was removed with NO pain and very minimal pain thereafter, really only a little discomfort.  I credit Dr. McLain for his skill.  Nothing like having a skilled doctor.  While there, I discovered Dr. McLain is also a plastic surgeon.  At age 55, I can use some help but was always uneasy with finding a good doctor that wouldn't do more harm than good.  I'm not sure I want to have anything done, but I now know who I'd go to.

name: Bailey Benton
text: highly recommend them for wisdom teeth removal!! i was in and out in about half an hour and my soreness levels have been very low. they were extremely efficient and professional! i hate waiting at the doctor's office and i certainly didn't have to do that here. if i had to get my wisdom teeth removed again, i'd come back here

name: MeeMoe's Wit and Wisdom
text: Professional and thorough, Dr. McLain and his staff put you at ease and help you make the best decision concerning a treatment plan.

name: Alexander Biega
text: I had a great experience and will definitely go back if I need anything else.

name: Anita Seldon
text: Dr.  Mclain is great! My extractions  were done expertly and it was over in less than 10 minutes.  Staff is wonderful! Having trismus, I wasn't at all certain  the nitrous oxide would work.  It worked like a charm.  Nice group of professionals.

name: Dee Carter
text: Dr. McClain is awesome!!!
